SA01asabhs_u:4_1: skandhāḥ pañca / rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:4_3_0: / āyatanāni dvadaśa / cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ śrotrāyatanaṃ śabdāyatanaṃ ghrāṇāyatanaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:4_3_1: gandhāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ manaāyatanaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:5_2: saparigrahadehātmavastu upabhogātmavastu abhilāpātmavastu sarvadharmādharmābhisaṃskārātmavastu [Abhidh-s_2] tadāśrayātmasvastu copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:6_2: upādānaṃ katamat / skandheṣu cchando rāgaśca / kasmāt / ḥcchando rāgaścopādānamityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:6_5: kasmād dhātava āyatanāni ca sopādānadharmā ityucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:7_0: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ rūpam / rūpaṇa lakṣaṇaṃ rūpam / tad dvividham / sparśena rūpaṇaṃ pradeśena rūpaṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:7_2: pradeśena rūpaṇaṃ katamat / deśena rūpaṇa midaṃ cedaṃ ca rūpamevaṃ caivaṃ ca rūpamiti praṇihitāpraṇihitacetovitarkeṇa pratibimbacitrīkāratā /
SA01asabhs_u:7_3: / kiṃlakṣaṇā vedanā / anubhavalakṣaṇā vedanā / nānāvidhānāṃ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavantyanenetyanubhavaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:7_4: / kiṃlakṣaṇā saṃjñā / saṃjānanālakṣaṇā saṃjñā / saṃjñā nānādharmapratibimbodgrahaṇa (svabhāvā) yayā draṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānarthān vyavaharati /
SA01asabhs_u:7_6: saṃskārabhisaṃskāra (svabhāvo) yena kuśalākuśalāvyakṛteṣu pakṣeṣu cittaṃ prerayati /
SA01asabhs_u:7_8: vijānanālakṣaṇaṃ vijñānam / vijñānaṃ yena rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmān nānā viṣayān vijānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:8_0: cakṣurdhātuḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ / yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭavān paśyati yacca tasya bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ taccakṣuḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:8_2: rūpadhātuḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ / rūpaṃ yaccakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate ca yacca tatra cakṣurdhātorādhipatyaṃ tadrūpadhātu lakṣaṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:8_3: yathā rūpadhātu lakṣaṇaṃ tathā śabdagandharasasparśadharmadhātūnāmapi lakṣaṇāni /
SA01asabhs_u:8_5: cakṣurāśrayā rūpālambanā rūpaprativijñaptiḥ yacca tasya bījamupacitaṃ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_1: yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ taccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:10_4: / pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ / kaṭhinatā // abdhātuḥ katamaḥ niṣyandatā /
SA01asabhs_u:10_5_0: / tejodhātuḥ katamaḥ / uṣṇatā // vāyudhātuḥ katamaḥ / kampanatā // upādāya rūpaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:10_5_1: katamat / cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jivhendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānāmekadeśo
SA01asabhs_u:10_6: / cakṣurindriyaṃ katamat / catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya cakṣuvijñānā śrayo rūpaprasādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_7: / śrotrendriyaṃ katamat / catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya śrotravijñānāśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_8: ghrāṇendriyaṃ katamat / catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya ghrāṇavijñānāśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_9: / jivhendriyaṃ katamat / catvāri mahabhūtānyupādāya jivhāvijñānaśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_10: / kāyendriyaṃ katamat / catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya kāyavijñānāśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_12: yathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmamunnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātamātapaḥ chāyā āloko 'dhakāramabhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:10_17: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā /
SA01asabhs_u:10_18: upāttamahābhūtahetuko vā anupāttamahābhūtahetuko vā tadubhayo bālokaprasiddho vā siddhopanīto vā parikalpito vā āryairdeśito vā tīrthaidaśito vā /
SA01asabhs_u:10_20: yathā surabhirasurabhiḥ samagandhaḥ sahajagandhaḥ sāṃyogikagandhaḥ pāriṇāmikagandhaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:10_23: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā sahajo vā sāṃyogiko vā pāriṇāmiko vā /
SA01asabhs_u:10_24: / spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katamaḥ / catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya kāyendriya grāhyo 'rthaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:10_25_0: ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ laghutvaṃ gurūtvaṃ picchilatvaṃ mandatvamamandatvaṃ śītatvamuṣṇatvaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:10_25_1: jighatsā pipāsā tṛptirbalaṃ daurbalayaṃ mūrcchā kaṇḍūtiḥ pūtirvyādhirjarāmaraṇaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:10_27: pañcavidham / ābhisaṃkṣepikamābhyavakāśiṃkaṃ sāmādānikaṃ parikalpitaṃ vaibhutvikaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:11_1: ṣaḍvedanākāyāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajivhākāyamanaḥ saṃsparśajā vedanā /
SA01asabhs_u:11_2: / evaṃ ṣaḍvedanā kāyāḥ sukhā vā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā /
SA01asabhs_u:11_3_0: / punaḥ sukhā kāyikī vedanā duḥkhā kāyikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā kāyikīvedanā sukhā
SA01asabhs_u:11_3_1: caitasikī vedanā duḥkhā caitasikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā caitasikī vedanā sukhā sāmiṣavedanā
SA01asabhs_u:11_3_2: duḥkhā sāmiṣavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā sāmiṣavedanā sukhā nirāmiṣavedanā duḥkhā nirāmiṣavedanā
SA01asabhs_u:11_3_3: aduḥkhāsukhā nirāmiṣavedanā punaḥ sukhā gredhāśritavedanā duḥkhā gredhāśritavedanā
SA01asabhs_u:11_3_4: aduḥkhāsukhā gredhāśritavedanā sukhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā duḥkhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā
SA01asabhs_u:11_7: nirāmiṣavedanā katamā / tattṛṣṇāviprayuktā vedanā // gredhāśritavedanā katamā / paṃcakāmaguṇatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktā vedanā /
SA01asabhs_u:12_1_0: ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā / śrotraghrāṇa / jivhākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā
SA01asabhs_u:12_1_1: saṃjñā yathā sanimittama pi saṃjānāti animittamapi parīttamapi mahadgata mapyapramāṇamapi
SA01asabhs_u:12_2: / sanimittasaṃjñā katamā / avyavahārakuśalasyānimittadhātusamā pannasya bhavāgrasamāpannasya ca saṃjñāṃ sthāpayitvā yāvadanyā saṃjñā /
SA01asabhs_u:12_3_0: / animittasaṃjñā katamā / yā sthāpitā saṃjñā // parīttā saṃjñā katamā / yayā kāmadhātuṃ
SA01asabhs_u:12_3_1: saṃjānāti // mahagdatā saṃjñā katamā / yayā rūpadhātuṃ saṃjānāti // apramāṇasaṃjñā
SA01asabhs_u:12_3_2: katamā / yayā ākāśāna ntyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ saṃjānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:12_4: / akiñcana saṃjñā katamā / yayā ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ saṃjānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:13_1_1: cetanā yayā kuśalatvāya cetayate saṃkleśāya cetayate avasthābhedāya cetayate itīyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:13_1_2: cetanā vedanāṃ saṃjñācca sthāpayitvā tadanye caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāśca
SA01asabhs_u:13_2_0: / te punaḥ katame / manaskāraḥ sparśaḥ cchando 'dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñāśraddhā
SA01asabhs_u:13_2_1: hīrapatrāpyamālobho 'dveṣo 'mohoḥ vīryaṃ praśrabdhirapramāda upekṣā apristhitā rāgaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:13_2_3: mithyādṛṣṭi krodha upanāhaḥ mrakṣaḥ pradāśaḥ īrṣyāḥ mātsaryaṃ śāṭhyaṃ mado vihinsā
SA01asabhs_u:13_2_4: āhrikyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitasmṛtitāsaṃprajanyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:13_5: / manaskāraḥ katamaḥ / cetasa ābhogaḥ / ālambanacitta dhāraṇakarmakaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_8: / cchandaḥ katamaḥ / īpsite vastuni tattadupasaṃhatā karttṛkāmatā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_10: / adhimokṣaḥ katamaḥ / niścite vastuni yathāniścayaṃ dhāraṇā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_11: asaṃhāryatākarmakaḥ // smṛti katamā / saṃsṛte vastuni cetasaḥ asaṃpramoṣo 'vikṣepakarmikā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_14: / prajñā katamā / upaparīkṣya eva vastuni dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_18: / apatrāpyaṃ katamat / parato 'vadyena lajjanā / tatkarmakameva // alobhaḥ katamaḥ / bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā anāsaktiḥ duścaritāpravṛttisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_19: adveṣaḥ katamaḥ / sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkha sthānīyeṣu ca dharme ṣvanāghātaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_21: amohaḥ katamaḥ / vipākato vā āgamato vādhigamato vā jñānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_23: vīryaṃ katamat / kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ sannāhe vā prayoge vā alīnatve vā avyāvṛttau vā asantuṣṭau vā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_25: / aśrabdhiḥ katamā / kāyacittadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratipraśrabdheḥ kāya cittakarmaṇyatā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_27: / amramādaḥ katamaḥ / savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohanniśritya yā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmbhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścittārakṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_29: / upekṣā katamā / savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohānniśritya yā saṃkliṣṭavihāravairodhikī cittasamatā cittapraśaṭhatā cittasyānābhogāvasthitatā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_33: duḥkhasaṃjananakarmakaḥ // pratighaḥ katamaḥ / sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghātaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_38: / bicikitsā katamā / satyeṣu vimatiḥ / kuśalapakṣāpravṛtti sanniśrayadānakarmikā /
SA01asabhs_u:13_39: / satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ katamā / pañcopādānaskandhānātmataḥ ātmīyato vā samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_41: / antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ katamā / pañcopādānaskandhān śāśva(ta)to vā ucchedato vā samanupaśyataḥ yā kṣāntī rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_43: / dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ katamaḥ / dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭayāśrayāṃśca pañcopādānaskandhānagrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭi /
SA01asabhs_u:13_46: śīlaṃ vrataṃ śīlavratā(śrayāṃ)śca pañcopādānaskandhān śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:13_48: / mithyādṛṣṭiḥ katamā / hetuṃ vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sadvā vastu nāśayataḥ mithyā ca vikalpayato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:14_0: yā etāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ āsāṃ kati samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ katyapavāddṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:14_1: catasraḥ samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ jñeye svabhāvaviśeṣasamāropatāmupādāya dṛṣṭau cāgraśuddhisamāropatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:14_3: yāśca purvāntakalpikā dṛṣṭayaḥ yāścaparāntakalpikā [Abhidh-s_8] dṛṣṭayaḥ tāḥ katibhyo dṛṣṭibhyo veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:14_4: dvābhyāṃ sarvābhyo vā / yā avyākṛtacastuṣu dṛṣṭayastāḥ katibhyo dṛṣṭibhyo veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:14_5_0: dvābhyāṃ sarvābhyo vā / kaṃ doṣaṃ paśyatā bhagavatā skandhadhātvāyatanegu pañcamiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:14_5_1: kāraṇairātmā pratikṣiptaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiparigṛhītān pañca doṣān paśyatā vilakṣaṇatādoṣaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:14_5_2: anityatādoṣaṃ asvāsthya doṣaṃ nirdehatādoṣaṃ ayatnato mokṣadoṣaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:14_6_0: / yā pañcasūpādānaskadheṣu viṃśatikoṭikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ rūpa[mā]tmeti samanupaśyati
SA01asabhs_u:14_6_1: rūpavantamātmānamātmīyaṃ (rūpaṃ) rūpe ātmānaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti
SA01asabhs_u:14_6_2: samanupaśyati vijñānavantamātmānamātmīyaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñāne ātmānaṃ tatra katyātmadṛṣṭayaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:15_0: krodhaḥ katamaḥ / pratyupasthite apakāranimitte prati[ghāṃ] śikaścetasa āghātaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:15_2: upanohaḥ katamaḥ tata ūrdhvaṃ pratighāṃśika eva vairāśayasyānutsargaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:15_4: makṣaḥ katamaḥ / samyak coditasya mohāṃśikā avadyapracchādanā /
SA01asabhs_u:15_8: / īrṣyā katamā / lābhasatkārā dhyavasitasya parasaṃpattiviśeṣe dveṣāṃśikaḥ a[marṣa] kṛtaścetaso vyāropaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:15_10: mātsaryaṃ katamat / lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya pariṣkāreṣu rāgāṃśiścetasa āgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:15_16: / madaḥ katamaḥ / ārogyaṃ vā āgamya yauvanaṃ vā dīrghāyuṣkalakṣaṇaṃ vopalabhyanyatamānyatamāṃ vā sāsravāṃ saṃpattiṃ rāgāṃśikannandīsaumanasyam /
SA01asabhs_u:15_18: / vihinsā katamā / prati[ghāṃśi]kā nirvṛṇatā niṣkaraṇatā nirdayatā /
SA01asabhs_u:16_2: śamathaparipanthakarmakam // āśradudhvaṃ katamat / mohāṃśikaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu cetaso 'nabhisaṃpratyayo 'prasādo 'nabhilāṣaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_6: / pramodaḥ katamaḥ / sakausīdyān rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścetaso 'nārakṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:16_8: / muṣitasmṛtitā katamā / kleśa saṃprayuktā smṛtiḥ / vikṣepasanniśrayadānakarmikā /
SA01asabhs_u:16_9: / asaṃprajanyaṃ katamat / kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayā asaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā pravartate /
SA01asabhs_u:16_12: sa punaḥ svabhāvavikṣepaḥ bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ adhyātmavikṣepaḥ nimi(tta) vikṣepaḥ dauṣṭhulyavikṣepaḥ manasikāravikṣepaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:16_13: svabhāvavikṣipaḥ katamaḥ / pañca vijñāna kāyāḥ // bahirdhā vikṣepa katamaḥ / kuśalaprayuktasya paṃcasu kāmaguṇeṣu cetaso visāraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_16_1: kuśalaprayuktasyotpannotpanneṣu vediteṣvahamiti vā mameti vā asmīti vā udgraho vyavakiraṇā
SA01asabhs_u:16_17: / manasikāravikṣepaḥ katamaḥ / samapattyantaraṃ vā yānāntaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya saṃśrayato vā yo visāraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_19: middhanimittamāgamya mohāṃśikaścetaso 'bhisaṃkṣepaḥ kuśalaḥ akuśalaḥ avyākṛtaḥ kāle vā akāle vā yukto vā ayukto vā /
SA01asabhs_u:16_21: / kaukṛtyaṃ katamat / yadabhipretānabhipretaṃ kāraṇākāraṇāmāgamya mohāṃśikaścetaso vipratisāraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_24: / vitarkaḥ katamaḥ / cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_25: sā ca cittasyaudārikatā // vicāraḥ katamaḥ / cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā pratyavekṣako manojalpaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:16_27: api khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svavipakṣaprahāṇaṃ karma /
SA01asabhs_u:17_1_1: jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyāḥ vyañjanakāyāḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ pravṛttiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:17_1_2: pratiniyamo yogaḥ javo 'nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṃkhyā sāmagrī ca /
SA01asabhs_u:17_2: / prāptiḥ katamā / kuśalakuśalāṃnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilagbhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_5: / āsaṃjñikaṃ katamat / asaṃjñisattveṣudeveṣūpapannasyāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe āsaṃjñikapriti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_6: / jīvitendriyaṃ katamat / nikāyasabhāge pūrvakarmāviddhe sthitikālaniyame āyuriti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_7: / nikāyasabhāgaḥ katamaḥ / teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃ stasmin sattvanikāye ātmabhāvasadṛśatāyāṃ nikāyasabhāga iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_8: / jātiḥ katamā / nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāmabhūtvābhāve jātiriti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_9: / jarā katamā / nikāyasabhāme saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhānyathātve jareti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_10: / sthitiḥ katamā / nikāyasabhāge prabandhāvipraṇāśe sthitiriti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_11: / anityatā katamā / nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhavināśe anityateti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_12: / nāmakāyāḥ katame / dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvādhivacane nāmakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_13: / padakāyāḥ katame / dharmāṇāṃ viśeṣādhivacane padakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_14: / vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_16: varṇo 'pi saḥ / arthasaṃvarṇanatāmupādāya / akṣare punaḥ paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:17_18: / pravṛttiḥ katamā / hetuphala prabandhānupacchede pravṛttiriti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_19: pratiniyamaḥ katamaḥ / hetuphalanānātve pratiniyama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_20: / yogaḥ katamaḥ / hetuphalānurūpye yoga iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_21: / javaḥ katamaḥ / hetuphalāśupravṛttau java iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_22: / anukramaḥ katamaḥ / hetuphalaikatye pravṛttau anukrama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_23: / kālaḥ katamaḥ / hetuphalaprabandhapravṛttau kāla iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_24: / deśaḥ katamaḥ / pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarā dharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:17_25: / saṃkhyā katamā / saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyekaśo bhede saṃkhyeti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:18_3: tadvāsanācitatāmupādāya // manaḥ katamat / yannityakālammanyanātmākamālayavijñānaṃ caturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamātmadṛṣṭyātmasnehenāsmimānenāvidyayā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:18_4: tacca sarvatragaṃ kuśale 'pyakuśale 'pyavyākṛte 'pi sthāpayitvā mārgasabhmukhībhāvaṃ nirodhasamāpattimaśaikṣa bhūmiṃ ca yacca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānam /
SA01asabhs_u:18_5: / vijñānaṃ katamat / ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ / cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotraghrāṇajivhākāyamanovijñānam /
SA01asabhs_u:18_6: cakṣurvijñānaṃ katamat / cakṣurāśrayā rūpālambanā prati vijñaptiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:19_0: dhātuvyavasthānaṃ katamat / rūpaskandhā eva daśa dhātavaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:19_1: cakṣurdhātuḥ rūpadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ ghrāṇadhātuḥ gandhadhātuḥ jivhādhātuḥ rasadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ mano dhātvekadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:19_8: kuśaladharmatathatā akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛtadharmatathatā ākāśam apratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ āniṃjyaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:19_9: / kuśaladharmatathatā katamā / nairātmyam / sā punarucyate śūnyatā animittaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ paramārtho dharmādhātuśca /
SA01asabhs_u:19_22: sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca buddha dharmanimittāśrayatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:19_23: / yathā kuśalaladharmatathatā tathā akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛta dharmatathatā ca jñeyā /
SA01asabhs_u:19_26: yo nirodho na visaṃyogaḥ // pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:19_27: yo nirodho visaṃyogaḥ // ānijyaṃ katamat / śubhakṛtsnavītarāgasyoparyavītarāgasya sukhanirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:19_29: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhāvāgrāduccalitasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāmanasikārapūrvakeṇa asthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca sthāvarāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:19_30: / paṃcarūpāṇi vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ te 'ṣṭau asaṃskṛtā dharmāścaivaṃ te ṣoḍaśa dharmadhātava ucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:20_0: āyatanavyavasthānaṃ katamat / daśa rūpadhātava eva daśa rūpāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:20_2: dharmadhāturdharmāyatanam // anene nayena skandhadhātvāyatanāni triṣu dharmeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:21_4: syāccakṣardhātu rna cakṣuḥ / yathā aṇḍe vā kalale vā arvude vā peśyāṃ vā mātuḥkukṣau vālabdhaṃ cakṣurlabdhaṃ vā naṣṭam /
SA01asabhs_u:21_8: / yathā cakṣuśya cakṣurdhātuśca tathā śrotraghrāṇajivhākāya dhātavo yathāyogyaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:21_9: / kiṃ syānmano 'pi manodhāturapi ahosvit syānmanodhāturapi mano 'pi /
SA01asabhs_u:21_11: yathā arhataścaramaṃ manaḥ / syānmanodhāturna manaḥ / yathā nirodhasamāpannasya yo manohetuḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:21_12: syānmano 'pi manodhāturapi / śiṣṭāsvavasthāsu / na syānmano 'pi manodhāturapi /
SA01asabhs_u:22_0: tadbhūmāvutpannaḥ kiṃ tadbhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:22_2: anyabhūmikenāpi / kāmadhātāvapapannaḥ māvacareṇa cakṣuṣā kāmāvacarāṇi rūpāṇi paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:22_4: yathā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi pratigṛṇhāti tatha śrotreṇa śabdaṃ pratigṛṇhāti /
SA01asabhs_u:22_5: yathā kāmadhātāvutpannastathā rūpadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa ghrāṇena jivhayā kāyena cā kāmāvacarān gandhān jighrati rasānāsvādane sparśān budhyati ca /
SA01asabhs_u:22_6: / rūpadhātāvutpanno rūpāvacareṇa kāyena svabhūmikān sparśān budhyati /
SA01asabhs_u:22_8: vijñaptyāhārarāgavirahāt / anena nayena na ghrāṇajivhayo rvijñānam /
SA01asabhs_u:22_9: kāmadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa manasā traidhātukānanāsravāṃśca dharmāna vijānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:22_11: / ārūpyadhātāvutpanna ārūpyāvacareṇa manasā ārūpyāvacarān svabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca dharmān vijānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:23_1: vijñānādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya // catvāri vijñānādhiṣṭhānāni vijñānāni ca pūrvāparāśritāni /
SA01asabhs_u:23_2: yathā rūpaṃ tathā bhavaḥ / yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīte /
SA01asabhs_u:23_4: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:23_6: vedanānimittagrahaṇābhisaṃskāreṇa saṃkleśavyavadānābhyāṃ ca saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ca /
SA01asabhs_u:24_4: vyatisārya snāpitaṃ gandhaṃ mālyaṃ ca paricarati /
SA01asabhs_u:25_0_0: skandhārthaḥ katamaḥ / yat kiṃcidrūpam / atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamadhyātmaṃ vā
SA01asabhs_u:25_0_1: bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre yadvāntike tatsarvamabhisaṃkṣipyocyate
SA01asabhs_u:25_1: yathā vittarāśiḥ / evaṃ yāvat vijñānaskandham // āpica duḥkhavaipulya lakṣaṇatāmupādāya skandha ucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:25_3: / api ca saṃkleśato bhāravahanatāmupādāya skandha ucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:26_0: dhātvarthaḥ katamaḥ / sarvadharmavījārthaḥ / svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthaḥ / kāryakāraṇa bhāvadhāraṇārthaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:27_1: yathā buddhena bhāṣitam rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ vedanā phenopamā saṃjñā marīcikopamā saṃskārāḥ parṇo pamā vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:27_2: kimarthaṃ rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:31_0: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu kathaṃ dravyamat kati dvayamanti kimarthaṃ dravyamatparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:31_3: / kathaṃ prajñaptimat / kati prajñaptimanti kimarthaṃ prajñaptimatparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:31_6: kathaṃ saṃvṛtimat / kati saṃvṛtimanti / kimarthaṃ saṃvṛtimatparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:31_9: / kathaṃ paramārthasat / kati paramārthasanti / kimarthaṃ paramārthasatparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:32_0: kathaṃ jñeyaṃ kati jñeyāni kimarthaṃ jñeyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:32_1: jñeyāni paṃca / rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:32_2: yatra saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ vayat saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vā yaśca saṃkleśayati vyavadāyayati vā yā ca tatrāvasthā yā ca vyavadānatā tadāśrayeṇa sarvaṃ jñeyam /
SA01asabhs_u:32_3: / tatra rūpaṃ rūpaskandho daśarūpadhātavo daśa rūpāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanasaṃgṛhītāni ca rūpāṇi /
SA01asabhs_u:32_5: / caitasikā dharmā vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:32_6: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ citta viprayuktaḥ saṃskāraskandho dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:32_8_0: / api khalu jñeyā dharmāḥ adhimuktijñānagocarato 'pi yuktijñānagocarato 'pi avisārajñānagocarato
SA01asabhs_u:32_10: / [Abhidh-s_17] kathaṃ vijñeyaṃ kati vijñeyāni kimarthaṃ vijñeyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:32_11: avikalpanato 'pi vikalpanato 'pi hetuto 'pi pravṛttito 'pi nimittato 'pi naimittakato 'pi vipakṣapratipakṣato 'pi sūkṣmaprabhedato 'pi vijñeyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:32_14: saṃkrāntito 'pi anuśravato 'pi caritapraveśato 'pi āgatito 'pi gatito 'pi niḥsaraṇato 'pi /
SA01asabhs_u:33_0: kathaṃ rūpi kati rūpīṇi kimarthaṃ rūpiparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:33_1_0: rūpi tadātmato 'pi bhūtāśrayato 'pi nandīsamudayato 'pi pradeśato 'pi deśavyāptito
SA01asabhs_u:33_7: / kathaṃ sanidarśanaṃ kati sanidarśanāni kimarthaṃ sanidarśanaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:33_8: cakṣurgocaraḥ sanidarśanam / śiṣṭasya rūpivat prabhedaḥ / sarvāṇi sanidarśanāni yathāyogaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:33_14: kathaṃ sapratighaṃ kati sapratighāni kimarthaṃ sapratigha parīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:33_16: api khalu tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sapratighaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:33_17: jātito 'pi upacayato 'pi aparikarmakṛtato 'pi tatra jātitaḥ yadya(da)nyo 'nyamāvṛṇotyavriyate ca /
SA01asabhs_u:34_0: kathaṃ sāsravaṃ kati sāsravāṇi kimarthaṃ sāsravaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_1: āsravatadātmato 'pi āsravasaṃbandhato 'pi āsravānuvandhato 'pi āsravānukūlyato 'pi āsravānvayato 'pi sāsravaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:34_2: pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ pañcadaśa dhātavo daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:34_5: sāsravaviparyayeṇānāsravam / pañcānupādanaskandhāḥ trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:34_7: kathaṃ saraṇaṃ kati saraṇāni kimarthaṃ saraṇaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_14: / kathaṃ sāmiṣaṃ kati sāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ sāmiṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_18: / kathaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kati nirāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ nirāmiṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_22: / kathaṃ gredhāśritaṃ kati gredhā śritāni kimarthaṃ gredhāśritaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_26: kathaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ kati naiṣkramyāśritāni kimarthaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_30: / kathaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kati saṃskṛtāni kimarthaṃ saṃskṛtaparīkṣā yasyotpā do 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapi tatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:34_40: / yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti [?] /
SA01asabhs_u:34_42: yenāsaṃskṛtaṃ na tenārthena saṃskṛtamityatra nayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:34_43: / kathaṃ laukikaṃ kati laukikāni kimarthaṃ laukikaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_44: traidhātukaparyāpannaṃ laukikaṃ lokottara pṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ ca tatpratibhāsam /
SA01asabhs_u:34_45: skandhānāmekadeśaḥ pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:34_47: / kathaṃ lokottaraṃ kati lokottarāṇi kimarthaṃ lokottaraparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:34_49: api khalu paryāyeṇa loko ttarapṛṣṭalabdhaṃ lokottaram /
SA01asabhs_u:35_5_0: ādyutpannaṃ prabandhotpannam upacayotpannam āśrayotpannaṃ vikārotpannaṃ paripākotpannaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:35_5_4: pūrvakālotpannaṃ maraṇakālo tpannam antarotpannaṃ pratisandhikālotpannaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:35_10: / kathaṃ grāhakaṃ kati grāhakāṇi kimarthaṃ grāhakaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:35_12: trayaḥ skandhā rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:35_14: / api khalu aprāptagrāhakaṃ prāptagrāhakaṃ svalakṣaṇavarttamānapratyeka grāhakaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇasarvakālaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhakaṃ ca grāhakaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:35_17: / kathaṃ grāhyaṃ kati grāhyāni kimarthaṃ grāhyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:35_21: / kathaṃ vahirmukhaṃ kati bahirmukhāni kimarthaṃ bahirmukha parīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:35_22: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ bahirmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā buddhaśāsane śrutamayacintāmayatadanudharmaparigṛhītāṃ ścittacaitasikān dharmān /
SA01asabhs_u:35_23: ca tvāro dhātavaḥ dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:35_27: catuto dhātūn sthāpayitvā dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:35_29: / [Abhidh-s_21] kathaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kati kliṣṭāni kimarthaṃ kliṣṭaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:35_31: nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ punaḥ sarvatragamanaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ kleśo rūpārūpya pratisaṃyu(kta)śca /
SA01asabhs_u:35_36: aṣṭau dhātavaḥ aṣṭāyatanāni skandhānāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ ca dhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:36_1_0: utpannaniruddha lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalopayo gato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānakāritra samatikrāntito
SA01asabhs_u:36_4_0: hetau satya nutpannato 'pi alabdhasva lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalānupayogato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānabhāvā
SA01asabhs_u:36_4_1: pratyupasthānato 'pi hetusvabhā vābhāvato 'pi abhinandanāsaṃkleśa nimittato 'pi abhinandanāvyavadānanimittato
SA01asabhs_u:37_0: kathaṃ pratyutpannaṃ kati pratyutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratyutpannaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_1_1: 'pi atītānāgata bhāva nimittato 'pi kāritrapratyupasthānato 'pi pratyutpannaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_5: / kathaṃ [Abhidh-s_22] kuśalaṃ kati kuśalāni kimarthaṃ kuśalaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_6_0: svabhāvato 'pi sambandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
SA01asabhs_u:37_7: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātunāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatānānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_9: / svabhāvataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat śraddhādaya ekādaśa caitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_12: teṣāmeva yā vāsanā // utthanataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat / tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyakarmma vākkarmma /
SA01asabhs_u:37_15: eṣāmeva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pūrvābhyāsamāgamyaṃ tadrūpā vipākābhinirvṛtiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_16: yathā teṣveva prakṛtyā apratisaṃkhyāya rūciḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA01asabhs_u:37_17: / prayogataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat / satpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāraṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiṃ kuśalasya bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_18: / puskārataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat / yattathāgataṃ vā puraskṛtya caitye vā pustagate vā citragate dharmaṃ vā puraskṛtya dharmādhiṣṭhāni pustake pūjākarma /
SA01asabhs_u:37_22: yaddānamayena puṇyakriyāvastunā vā śīlamayena vā svargopapattiparigraho vā āḍhyo kulopapattiparigraho vā vyavadānānukūlyaparigraho vā pratipakṣataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
SA01asabhs_u:37_23: yo vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣa dūrobhāva pratipakṣaḥ viṣkambhaṇāpratipakṣaḥ visaṃyogapratipakṣaḥ kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_24_0: / upaśamataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat / yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:37_24_1: paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaḥ sopadhiśeṣo
SA01asabhs_u:37_26: upaśamaprāptasya tadādhipatyena vaiśeṣikā guṇā abhijñādayo laukikalokottarāḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_28_0: svabhāvato 'pi saṃbandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
SA01asabhs_u:37_32: manaḥsaṃprayuktaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kleśaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ klaśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpakaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_36: teṣāmeva vāsanā // utthānato 'kuśalaṃ katamat samutthāpitaṃ kāyavākkarma /
SA01asabhs_u:37_39: yathāpi tadakuśalā bhyāsa stūdapo vipāko 'bhinivarttate yenākuśala eva rūciḥ santiṣṭhate /
SA01asabhs_u:37_40: / prayogato 'kuśalaṃ katamat / yathāpi tadasatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyasaddharmaśravaṇamayoni śomanaskāraṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścarītaṃ carati /
SA01asabhs_u:37_42_0: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsāpūrvakaṃ vā kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:37_42_1: vā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tatra vā pūjākarma prayojayati yatra mahān janakāyo 'puṇyena
SA01asabhs_u:37_44: yathāpi tatsattveṣu kāyena vācā manasā mithyā pratipadyate /
SA01asabhs_u:37_46: yathā tatkāyena duścaritaṃ caritvā vācā manasā duścaritaṃ caritvā durgatau vā sugatau vā aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ gṛṇhātyakṣepakaṃ vā paripūrakaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_48: / pari panthato 'kuśalaṃ katamat ye kuśalāntarāyikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_50_0: svābhāvato 'pi sambandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
SA01asabhs_u:37_50_1: 'pi prayogato 'pi puraskārato 'pi anugrahato 'pi upabhogato 'pi parigrahato 'pi pratipakṣato
SA01asabhs_u:37_54: aṣṭau rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni sasaṃprayogaṃ manojīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgo nāma kāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:37_56: aduṣṭāprasannacittasya taireva nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ cittacaitasikā [Abhidh-s_24] dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_64: prayogato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat akliṣṭākuśalacetasa airyāpathikaṃ śailpasthānikaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:37_66_0: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsākudṛṣṭi vivarjitaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:37_66_1: caityaṃ vā pratiṣṭhāpayati pūjākarma vā prayojayati yatra mahājanakāyo na puṇyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:37_68: yathāpi taddāsabhṛtakakarmakareṣu putradāreṣu vā aduṣṭāprasannacitto dānaṃ dadāti /
SA01asabhs_u:37_72: yathāpi tacchilpasthānasyābhyastatvādāyatyāṃ tadrūpaṃ mātmabhāvaparigrahaṃ karoti yena laghu ladhveva teṣu śilpasthāneṣu śikṣāniṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
SA01asabhs_u:37_79: draṣṭavyam // tatpunaḥ katamat // yadbuddhāḥ paramapāramiprāptāśca bodhisattvā nidarśayanti sattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ na tu teṣāṃ tatra tathā kācit pariniṣpattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_80: kathaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kati kā(ma)pratisaṃyuktāni kimarthaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_82: catvāro dhātavo dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_86: / caturo dhātūna dve cāyatane sthāpayitā tadanyeṣāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_92: / vairāgyaṃ punarekadeśavairāgyaṃ skalavairāgyaṃ prativedhavairāgyamupaghātavairāgyaṃ samudghātavairāgyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_94: / prakṛtivairāgyaṃ katamat / duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dhamaṣu yā pratikulatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_95: / upaghātavairāgyaṃ katamat / maithunaprayuktasya dāhavigame yā pratikūlatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_99: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptava to nirhīne sthāne yā pratikūlatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_100: / sammohavairāgyaṃ katamat / bālānāṃ nirvāṇe yā pratikūlatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_102: laukikena vā lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa yatkleśaprahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_103: / parijñāvairāgyaṃ katamat / pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuke yā pratikūlatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_104: / prahāṇivairāgyaṃ katamat / bhūmau bhūmau kleśān prajahato yā pratikūlatā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_105: / sottaravairāgyaṃ katamat / laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca yadvairāgyam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_108: / kathaṃ śaikṣaṃ kati śaikṣāṇi kimarthaṃ śaikṣaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_114: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_116: / kathaṃ naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ kati naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāni kimarthaṃ naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣa parīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_117: pṛthagjanasya kuśalākuśalāvyakṛtaṃ śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamaśaikṣasya cāvyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_118: aṣṭau dhātavo 'ṣṭā vāyatanāni tadanyeṣāṃ [Abhidh-s_26] skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_120: / kathaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ kati darśanaprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ darśanaprahātavyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_121_0: parikalpitā kliṣṭā dṛṣṭiḥ vicikitsādṛṣṭisthānaṃ ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:37_121_1: yacca dṛṣṭyā samutthāpitaṃ kāyavā kkarma sarvaṃ cāpāyikaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:37_123: / kathaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ kati bhāvanāprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_128: skaṃdhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_130: / kathaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ kati pratītyasamutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratītyasamutpannaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:37_135: / kathamaṅgavibhāgataḥ / dvādaśāṅgāni / dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopadānaṃ bhavo jāti rjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:37_137: / ākṣepakāṅgaṃ katamat / avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:37_138: / ākṣiptakāṅgaṃ katamat / nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:37_140: tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavaśca / abhinirvṛttyaṅgaṃ katamat / jāti rjarāmaraṇaṃ ca // kathamaṅgapratyayatvavyavasthānataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_141: vāsanāto 'pyāvedhato 'pi manasikārato 'pi sahabhāvato 'pyāṅgānāṃ pratyayatvavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ tacca yathāyogam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_143: avidyā kiṃkarmikā / bhave ca sattvān saṃmohayati pratyayaśca [Abhidh-s_27] bhavati saṃskārāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:37_144: / saṃskārāḥ kiṃkarmakāḥ / gatiṣu ca sattvān vibhajanti pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānavāsanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_145: / vijñānaṃ kiṃ karmakam / sattvānāṃ karmabandhaṃ ca dhārayati pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_146: / nāmarūpaṃ ca kiṃkarmakam / ātmabhāvaṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratyayaśca bhavati ṣaḍāyatanasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_147: / ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kiṃkarmakam // ātmabhāvaparipūriṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratya yaśca bhavati sparśasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_148: / sparśaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ / viṣayopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_149: vedanā kiṃkarmikā / janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati tṛṣṇāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_150: / tṛṣṇā kiṃkarmikā / janmani ca sattvānākarṣayati pratyayaśca bhavati upādānasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_151: / upādānaṃ kiṃkarmakam / punarbhavādānārthaṃ sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti pratyayaśca bhavati bhavasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_152: / bhavaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ / punarbhave ca sattvānabhimukhīkaroti pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_153: / jātiḥ kiṃkarmikā / nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya /
SA01asabhs_u:37_154: / jarāmaraṇaṃ kiṃkarmakam / punaḥ punarvayaḥpariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvānyojayati /
SA01asabhs_u:37_156: yā cāvidyā yā ca tṛṣṇā yaccopādānamityayaṃ saṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_157: ye ca saṃskārā yacca vijñānaṃ yaśca bhava ityayaṃ karmasaṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_161: anityārthaḥ kṣaṇikārthaḥ hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedārthaḥ anurūpahetuphalārthaḥ vicitrahetuphalārthaḥ pratiniyatahetuphalārthaśca pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:37_162: / kathaṃ gāmbhīryataḥ / hetu gāmbhīryato 'pi lakṣaṇagāmbhīryato 'pi utpattibhāgāmbhīryato 'pi sthitigāmbhīryato 'pi vṛttigāmbhīryato 'pi gāmbhīryaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:37_166: na svato na parato na dvābhyāṃ na svayaṃkārāpa(ra)kārāhetusamutpannaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_0: kathaṃ pratyayaḥ kati pratyayāḥ kimarthaṃ pratyayaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:39_4: / api khalu svabhāvato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sahāyato 'pi saṃpratipattito 'pi paripanthato 'pi parigrahato 'pi hetupratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_5: / kathaṃ svabhāvataḥ / kāraṇaṃ hetusvabhāvataḥ // kathaṃ prabhedataḥ / utpattikāraṇaṃ tadyathā cakṣuḥ sāmagrī vijñānasya /
SA01asabhs_u:39_6: / sthitikāraṇaṃ tadyathā āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:39_29: tadyathā vijñānasya indriyamaparibhinnaṃ viṣaya ābhāsagataḥ tajjaśca manaskāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_33: / kathaṃ sahāyataḥ / ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenotpadyante nānyatamavaikalyena /
SA01asabhs_u:39_35: / kathaṃ saṃpratipattitaḥ / ye dharmāḥ sa(ha)bhāvenālambanaṃ saṃpratipadyante nānyatamavaikalyena /
SA01asabhs_u:39_37: / kathaṃ puṣṭitaḥ / pūrvabhāvitānāṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭatarā puṣṭatamā pravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_39: nirvāṇasantānadūrīkaraṇāya // kathaṃ parigrahataḥ / akuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāśca dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_40: ātmabhāvaparigrahāya // kathaṃ samanantarataḥ nairantaryasamanantarato 'pi sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisamanantarato 'pi samanantarapratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:39_42_2: 'pi laukikaviśuddhya dhipatito 'pi lokottaraviśuddhya dhipatito 'pi adhipati pratyayo
SA01asabhs_u:40_0: kathaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaṃ kati sabhāgatatsabhāgāni kimarthaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_5: rūpaskandhaikadeśaḥ pañca rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni - caturṇāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:40_9: vedanāskandho vijñānaskandha rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:40_11: / kathaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā kati duḥkhaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_14: / kathaṃ viparīṇāmaduḥkhatā kati viparīṇāmaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_15: sukhavedanāvipariṇatisvalakṣaṇato 'pi sukhavedanīyadharmavipariṇatisvalakṣaṇato 'pi tatra cānunayacittavipariṇatito 'pi vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_17: / kathaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatā kati saṃskāraduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_19: skandhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayorekadeśaṃ sthāpayitvā sarvāṇi /
SA01asabhs_u:40_21: / kathaṃ savipākaṃ kati savipākāni kimarthaṃ savipākaparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_26: tadanyattu vipākajam // kathamāhāraḥ katyāhārāḥ kimarthaṃ māhāraparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:40_27: pariṇatito 'pi pāriṇāmikaḥ viṣayato 'pi vaiṣayikaḥ āśayato 'pyāśi (? śayi)kaḥ upādānato 'pyupādānikaḥ āhāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:40_30: / api khalvāhāro 'śuddhā śrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ sthitisāṃdarśinakaśca draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:40_31: / kathaṃ sottaraṃ [Abhidh-s_31] kati sottarāṇi kimarthaṃ sottaraparīkṣā /
SA01asabhs_u:41_3: skandhadhātvāyataneṣvātmeti vā sattvo jīvo jantuḥ poṣo pugdalo manujo mānava iti vā yatparikalpyate /
SA01asabhs_u:42_2: / lakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / pratyekaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ svalakṣaṇa bhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:42_3: / prakāraprabhedaḥ / teṣāmevaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dravyamantaḥ prajñaptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamantaḥ rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādi yathānirddiṣṭaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:42_4: / āśrayaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / yāvantaḥ sattvāśrayā stāvanti skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:42_7: ātmābhiniveśaṃ parijānāti // prakāraprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:42_8: piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ parijānāti // āśrayaprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:43_0: api khalu ṣaḍvidhaḥ prabhedaḥ eṣāmeva skandhadhātvāyatananām /
SA01asabhs_u:43_1: bahirmukhaprabhedaḥ antarmukhaprabhedaḥ āyata kālabhedaḥ paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ tatkālaprabhedaḥ saṃdarśanaprabhedaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:43_4: / antarmukhaprabhedaḥkatamaḥ / sarvāḥ sāmādhibhūmayaḥ // āyatakālaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / pṛthagjanānām // paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:43_5: śaikṣāṇāṃ sthāpayitvā caramakṣaṇe skandhadhātvāyatanāni [Abhidh-s_32] tadanyāni aśaikṣāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:43_8: buddhānāṃ pāramiprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca sanidarśanāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:45_1_0: lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ dhātusaṃgrahaḥ jātisaṃgrahaḥ avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ sahāyasaṃgrahaḥ deśasaṃgrahaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:45_2: / lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratyekaṃ svalakṣaṇenaiva tattatsaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_5: / avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / sukhāvasthānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatānānāṃ svalakṣaṇena saṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_7: avasthāmupādāya // sahāya saṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / rūpaskandhaḥ tadanyaiḥskandhairanyo 'yaṃ sahāyataḥ sahāyaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_8: evaṃ tadanye skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:45_9: deśasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / pūrvadigāśritānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ svalakṣaṇena saṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_11: / kālasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / atītānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ svalakṣaṇena saṃgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_13: ekadeśasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_14: / sakalasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ / yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_15: / itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:45_19: sapta dhātava ekamāyatanam // cakṣurdhātusaṃgrahe kati skandhaḥ katyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:45_23: ekaḥ skandha ekamāyatanam // dharmadhātusaṃgrahe kati skandhāḥ katyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:45_34: / tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairnirdṛśyante anye ca na skandhadhātvāyatanairnirddiśyante /
SA01asabhs_u:45_35: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdṛṣṭāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:45_40: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:47_1: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:47_5: [Abhidh-s_34] paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:47_9: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:47_20: / api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ kleśānām /
SA01asabhs_u:47_21: / kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām /
SA01asabhs_u:47_26: / bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yadbhūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām /
SA01asabhs_u:47_28: / ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagjanikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:47_29: / anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:47_31: cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃvyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:47_32: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nairātmyamavatarati /
SA01asabhs_u:49_0: samanvāgamaḥ katamaḥ / lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavat // tatprabhedaḥ punaḥ trividhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_2_0: / vījasamanvāgamaḥ katamaḥ / kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:49_3: / kuśalaiḥ // rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_5: ārūpyapratisaṃ(yu)ktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ upapatti(prāti)lābhikaiśca kuśalaiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_6: / traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_8: / vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ katamaḥ / prayogikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā) vyākṛtānām /
SA01asabhs_u:49_10: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_11: / samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:49_16: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya /
SA01asabhs_u:52_0: viniścayaḥ katamaḥ / satyaviniścayo dharmaviniścayaḥ prāptiviniśca sāṃkathyaviniścayaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:53_0: satyaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / catvāyāryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:53_2_1: jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu caturmā(hā)rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu
SA01asabhs_u:54_1_0: apmaṇḍale pṛthivīmaṇḍalam / pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:54_1_1: aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ samudro vāhyasamudraścatasraḥ sumerupariṣaṇḍāḥ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_1_2: vāpastriṃśānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_1_3: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:54_2_0: uṣṇanarakāḥśītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:54_2_1: yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo 'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_2_2: candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_2_3: sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_2_4: sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:54_3: / sahasraṃ sahasracūḍikānāṃ dhātūnāmucyate dvitīyo [Abhidh-s_37] madhyamasāhasro lokadhātuḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:54_5: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:54_7: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati /
SA01asabhs_u:54_8: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā /
SA01asabhs_u:54_9: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:54_10: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam /
SA01asabhs_u:54_11: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:54_12: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām /
SA01asabhs_u:55_1_0: “jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:55_1_1: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā
SA01asabhs_u:55_2: / jātiḥ kimupādāya duḥkham / saṃbādhaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyaduḥkhāśrayatāṃ copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:56_7: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:56_10: / yaduktaṃ tisro duḥkhatāḥ / tāsu aṣṭau duḥkhāni saṃgṛhitāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:56_11: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:56_13: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:56_14: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:56_17: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:56_18: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:56_19: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:56_20: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:57_2_0: / anityalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / samāsato dvādaśavidham / asallakṣaṇaṃ vināśalakṣaṇaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:57_3: / asallakṣaṇaṃ katamat / skandhadhātvāyataneṣu sarvakāli kātmātmīyatā nityābhāvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:57_5: taktālaṃ bhūtvābhāvaḥ // vipariṇatilakṣaṇaṃ katamat / saṃskārāṇāmanyathābhāvaḥ / prabandhāsādṛśyena pravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:57_6: / viyogalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / saṃskāreṣu vaśitvabhraṃśaḥ paraiḥsvīkaraṇaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:57_8: / dharmatālakṣaṇaṃ katamat / āgāminyanityatā / yāmāvaśyamanubhaviṣyati // kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇādūrddhamanavasthānam /
SA01asabhs_u:57_9: / prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / anādimati saṃskāre utpannaniruddhā nāṃ prabandhāprahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:57_10: / vyadhyādi lakṣaṇa katamat / [Abhidh-s_39] caturṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ kālopabhogaḥ jīvitavipariṇāmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:57_12: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:57_13_0: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā
SA01asabhs_u:57_13_1: nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita
SA01asabhs_u:57_18: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:57_19: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:57_20: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:57_32: / yaduktam anyatare, sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti /
SA01asabhs_u:57_33: tatra āyudāyaḥ katamaḥ / kāle maraṇam / puṇyakṣayaḥ katamaḥ / akāle maraṇam apuṇyamaraṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:57_36: karmakṣayaḥ katamaḥ / upapadyavedanīyakarmaṇaḥ aparaparyāvedanīyakarmaṇaśca ubhayo kṣayānmaraṇa /
SA01asabhs_u:58_0: duḥkhalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāraṃ vā [Abhidh-s_40] duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:58_1: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:58_6: / tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
SA01asabhs_u:58_7: / api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādayo 'ṣṭau duḥkhāni /
SA01asabhs_u:58_8: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:58_9: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:59_0: śūnyatālakṣaṇaṃ katamat / teṣu tasya abhāvaḥ / anena nayena samanupaśyanāśūnyatā /
SA01asabhs_u:59_1: punaḥ teṣu anyasya bhāvaḥ / anena nayena yathābhūtajñānabhāvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:59_4: anena nayena teṣāṃ śūnyatā / teṣu anyasya bhāvaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:59_5: te ṣveva nairātmyam / tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano 'stitā satī śūnyatā /
SA01asabhs_u:59_8: / api khalu trividhā śūnyatā / svabhāvaśūnyatā tathābhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:59_9: ādyā parikalpitā draṣṭavyā / tṛtīyā pariniṣpannasvabhāvā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:60_0: anātmalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / yathātmavāde sthitasya ātmalakṣaṇasya skandhadhātvāyataneṣu [Abhidh-s_41] tallakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:60_2: idamucyate anātmalakṣaṇam // etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
SA01asabhs_u:60_3: / api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo 'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:60_4: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko 'rtha uktaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:61_1: tat kathaṃ jñāyate / yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:61_2: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:61_3: / api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:62_0: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /
SA01asabhs_u:62_1: tatkiṃ sandhāyoktam / saṃbhavaṃ sandhāyoktam / ekadeśāśrayībhāvārtha upādāyārthaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:62_2: / yatra punaḥ samudāye yadbhūtamupalabhyate tattatrā stiti vaktavya /
SA01asabhs_u:62_4: upādāyarūpe 'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:62_5: / yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ [Abhidh-s_42] paramāṇurveditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:62_6: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:63_0: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:63_1: / asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:64_0: yaduktaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkhamiti / tatra maraṇaṃ trividham / kuśalacittasyāvyākṛtacittasya ca /
SA01asabhs_u:64_1: / paṭuke cittaprakāre svakuśala mūlabalādhānato (vā) paropasaṃhārato vā kuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:64_2: / paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:64_3: / paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:64_7: tadyathā kṛṣṇasya kutapasya nirbhāso 'ndhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:64_8: / aśubhakāriṇastadyathā śuklasya parasya nirbhāsajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:64_12: ekadā ca vyāvarttate / tatrasthaśca karmopacinoni sabhāgāṃśca sattvān paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:64_15: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti /
SA01asabhs_u:64_19: / sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:66_1: / prādhānyanirddeśastu (? śāstu) bhagavatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī samudayasatyanirdeśena nirdiṣṭā /
SA01asabhs_u:66_2_0: / prādhānyārthaḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ sarvatragārthaḥ // sarvatragārthaḥ katamaḥ / tatha
SA01asabhs_u:66_2_1: hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā
SA01asabhs_u:66_3: parisaṃkhyānato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pyutthāna to 'pyālambanato 'pi saṃprayogato 'pi paryāyato 'pi vipratipattito 'pi dhatuto 'pi nikāyato 'pi prahāṇato 'pi kleśo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:66_4: / parisaṃkhyānaṃ katamat // ṣaṭ kleśā daśa vā // ṣaṭ kleśāḥ katamat / rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā vicikitsā dṛṣṭiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:66_5: / ta eva dṛṣṭeḥ pañcākārjabhedena daśa bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:66_6: / lakṣaṇaṃ katamat / yo dharma utpadyamāno 'praśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyamānena yena kāya cittaprabandhāpraśamapravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:66_7: idaṃ kleśalakṣaṇam / utthānaṃ katamat / kleśānuśayaścāprahīṇo bhavati kleśasthānīyaśca dharma ābhāsagato bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:66_8: tatra ca ayoniśo manaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:66_9: evaṃ kleśa utpadyate / idamucyate utthānam // ālambanaṃ katamat sarvakleśaprayogaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:66_11: api khalu kāmāvacaraḥ kleśaḥ sthāpayitvā avidyā dṛṣṭi vicikitsāṃ ca tadanyaḥ urdhvabhūmyanālambanaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:66_13: tadbhūmito vītarāgatvāt / nirodhamārgasatyā lambanaḥ kleśo nirodhamargālambanānabhiśliṣṭaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:67_0: saṃprayogaḥ katamaḥ / rāgaḥ pratighena na saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:67_4: / pratigho rāgeṇa mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:67_5: / mānaḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:67_7: asāmānyā avidyā / asāmānya avidyā katamā / satyeṣvajñānam // dṛṣṭiḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:67_10: / styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādaśca sarvatra kliṣṭe saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:68_0: paryāyaḥ katamaḥ / sarvakleśā nānārthāśrayā nānavasthāḥ paryāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:68_1_0: saṃyojanaṃ bandhanaṃ anuśayaḥ upakleśaḥ paryavasthānam oghaḥ yogaḥ upādānam granthaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:68_1_1: nivaraṇam khilaḥ malaḥ nighaḥ śalyaḥ kiṃcanaḥ duścaritam āsravaḥ vighātaḥ paridāhaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:69_0: saṃyojanāni kati kathaṃ saṃyojanaṃ kutra saṃyojanam /
SA01asabhs_u:69_1_0: saṃyojanāni nava / anunayasaṃyojanam pratighasaṃyojanam mānasaṃyojanam avidyāsaṃyojanam
SA01asabhs_u:70_0: anunayasaṃyojanaṃ katamat / traidhātuko rāgaḥ / anunayasaṃprayojanena saṃprayuktaḥ traidhātukaṃ nodvejayati /
SA01asabhs_u:71_1: pratighasaṃyojanaṃ katamat / sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu na dharmeṣu cittasya vihiṃsā /
SA01asabhs_u:72_0: mānasaṃyojanaṃ katamat / sapta mānāḥ / māno 'timāno mānatimāno 'smimāno 'bhimāna ūnamāno mithyāmānaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:72_1: mānaḥ katamaḥ / hīnān śreyānasmi (a) sadṛśena sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:72_2: atimānaḥ katamaḥ / sadṛśāt śreyānasmi śreyasā sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:72_3: mānātimānaḥ katamaḥ / śreyasaḥ śreyānasmīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:72_5: abhimānaḥ katamaḥ / aprāpta uttare viśeṣā dhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:72_7: mithyāmānaḥ katamaḥ / aguṇavato guṇavānasmīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:73_0: avidyāsaṃyojanaṃ katamat / traidhātukamajñānam / avidyasaṃyojanena saṃprayuktā duḥkhadharmān samudayadharmān nādhyavasyati /
SA01asabhs_u:74_1: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāniḥsaraṇaṃ parikalpitavipratisāraṃ paryeṣane abhiniviśate /
SA01asabhs_u:76_0: vicikitsāsaṃyojanaṃ katamat / satyeṣu vimatiḥ / vicikitsāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu ratneṣu vicikitsate ratnatrayaṃ na samudāvarati /
SA01asabhs_u:77_1: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:78_0: mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ katamat / lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya pariṣkāreṣu cetasa āgrahaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:78_1: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:79_0: bandhanaṃ trividham / rāgabandhanaṃ dveṣabandhanaṃ mohabandhanaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:79_4: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:80_0: anuśayāḥ sapta / kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayaḥ bhavarāgānuśayaḥ mānānuśayaḥ avidyānuśayaḥ dṛṣṭayanuśayaḥ vicikitsānuśayaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:80_4: / mānānuśayaḥ katamaḥ / mānapakṣīyaṃ doṣṭhulyam // avidyānuśayaḥ katamaḥ avidyāpakṣīyaṃ dauṣṭhulyam /
SA01asabhs_u:80_5: / dṛṣṭyanuśayaḥ katamaḥ / dṛṣṭipakṣīyaṃ dauṣṭhulyam // vicikitsānuśayaḥ katamaḥ / vicikitsāpakṣīyaṃ dauṣṭhulyam /
SA01asabhs_u:80_9: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:80_10: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:81_1: upakleśāstu na kleśāḥ / kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:81_2: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / ṣaḍrāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ krodhādikaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:81_3: api khalu rāgo dveṣo mohaśca caitasikā upakleśā ucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:81_4: yaiścitte upakleśo na vairāgyaṃ na viumokṣo nāvaraṇaprahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:81_5: ata ucyante upakleśāḥ / tathā ca bhagavatoktam dīrgharātraṃ vo rāgadveṣamohā upakliśyantui vikṣipanti citraṃ saṃkliśyanti /
SA01asabhs_u:82_0: paryavasthānānyaṣṭau / styānaṃ middhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyamīrṣyā mātsaryamāhikyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:82_1: punaḥ punaḥ udvegena cittaṃ paryayanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:82_2: tathāca śamathapragrahanimittabhāvanākāle tatsanniśraya brahmacaryā diśuddhi saṃgṛhītaśīla kāle cittaṃ paryavanahyanti /
SA01asabhs_u:83_2: saṃkeśānvayataḥ / ādyaḥ kāmaiṣaṇābhāvanā / dvitīyaḥ bhavaiṣaṇābhāvanā / aparāvubhau mithyābrahmacaryaiṣaṇābhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:85_0: upādānāni catvāri / kāmopādānaṃ dṛṣṭyupādānaṃ śīlavratopādānamātmavādopādānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:85_11: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo 'nyaṃ na vivadanti /
SA01asabhs_u:86_0: granthāścatvāraḥ / abhidhyākāyagranthaḥ vyāpādakāyagranthaḥ śīlavrata parāmarśakāyagranthaḥ tatsatyābhiniveśopādānakāyagranthaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:86_2: tena kiṃ bhavati / caturvidhaṃ cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA01asabhs_u:87_0: nivaraṇāni pañca / kāmacchandanivaraṇam vyāpādanivaraṇam styānamiddhanivaraṇam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam vicikitsānivaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:87_2: tacca pravrajyāyāmabhiratau codanāyāṃ pratipattau śamathe pragrahe upekṣāyāṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:88_2: cittasyādāntatayā akarmaṇyatayā durvimokṣatayā ca sattvaistasyāścaryāyā durbhedyatvāt khila ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:89_2: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyadbhirucyate ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo 'śuciḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:90_1: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:91_1: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:92_1: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya vittasaṃcayeṣu sabhayāḥ savairā bhūyo vihāravikṣepāḥ kiṃcanā nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:93_0: duścaritāni trīṇi / rāgaduścaritaṃ dveṣaduścaritaṃ mohaduścaritaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:93_3: tat katham / sattvā loke āmiṣakiṃcitkahato caranti /
SA01asabhs_u:94_2: te punaḥ katham / bahirdhā visāraṃ niśritya kāmāsravaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:95_3: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:96_2: tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:98_1: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:98_3: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa adharmarāgeṇa mahādahanena paridahanti viṣamalobhena mahādahanena paridahanti mithyādharmeṇa mahādahanena paridahantīti jvarā nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:98_5: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa jātimaraṇamūleṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃyojayanti saṃjanayanti sattvān nānāvidhakāyeṣu pañcagatisaṃsāreṣu abhinirvarttayantīti rāgādayo vanasā ityucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:99_1: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe 'pi santoṣaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:100_0: vipratipattiḥ katamā / rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau /
SA01asabhs_u:100_6: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:100_7: tannidānapadasthānataḥ / punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:101_0: dhātu katamaḥ / pratighaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanye sarve traidhātukapratisaṃyuktāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:101_2: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:101_11: / yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:101_16: / avidyā dvividhā / saṃprayuktā asāmānyā ca / sarvakleśasaṃprayogataḥ saṃprayuktā avidyā yathāveditaṃ saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:101_25: / yathā rāgastathā avidyā // māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā ca sarvatra manovijñānakāyikāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:101_26: / api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau vastvekadeśapravṛttikāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:101_27: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:102_1: nikāyaḥ katamaḥ / dvau kleśanikāyau / darśanaprahātavyanikāyo bhāvanāprahātavyanikāyaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:102_7: rūpadhātau duḥkhādicaturvidhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ pratyekaṃ navakleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:102_9: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:102_11: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:102_12: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:103_0: prahāṇaṃ katamat / tathā paryāyaprahāṇaṃ tena manaskāreṇa prahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:103_4: parijñānaṃ katamat / tannidānavastuparijñānam svabhāvaparijñānam ādīnavaparijñānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:103_5: parivarjanaṃ katamat / tatkālotpannasyānādānam / pratipakṣalābhaḥ katamaḥ / anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:103_6: / tena manaskāreṇa prahāṇam / kīdṛśena manaskāreṇa kiṃ prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:103_7: asaṃbhinnālambanena manaskāreṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:103_11: nātītāt niruddhataḥ / nānāgatāt anutpannataḥ / na pratyutpannāt asahabhāvataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:103_13: yathā yathā dauṣṭhulyamutpadyate tathā tathā pratipakṣa utpadyate yathā yathā pratipakṣa utpadyate tathā tathā dauṣṭhulyanirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:103_14: samaṃ samam / yathā [Abhidh-s_53] loke jyotirutpadyate tamaśca nirudhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:104_2: sarvaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ nāma // punaḥ karma pañcavidham / upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyavasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:104_4: / cetanākarma katamat / puṇyakarma apuṇyakarma āniṃjyakarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:104_5: / cetayitvā karma katamat / kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:104_6: tāni trīṇi kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi akuśalāni kuśalāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:104_8: prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānam kāmamithyācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ piśunavāk paruṣavāk saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ abhidyā vyāpādaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:104_9_0: kuśalāni katamāni / daśa kuśalakarmāpathāḥ / prāṇātipātād viratiḥ adattādānādviratiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:104_9_1: kāmamithyācārādviratiḥ mṛṣāvādādviratiḥ piśunavāco viratiḥ paruṣavāco viratiḥ saṃbhinnapralāpādviratiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:105_0_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre cetanākarma / katamāni cetanākarmāṇi parājñaptisaṃcetanīyatākarma
SA01asabhs_u:105_1: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatākarma viparyāsaṃcetana yatā karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:105_2: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatā karmaviparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarmabhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ ca na nāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate /
SA01asabhs_u:107_0: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:107_3: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:107_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre / daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:107_5: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:107_6: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:108_0: kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ sugatau durgatau ca vipāko 'bhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:108_2: ākṣepakaṃ karma katamat / yena phala vipāko 'bhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:108_3: paripūrakaṃ karma katamat / yenopapanna iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ vedayate /
SA01asabhs_u:108_4: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā /
SA01asabhs_u:108_7: kāye yad audārikaṃ pūrvaṃ pacyate cyutikāle pratyupasthitaṃ vā pūrvaṃ bahulīkāratāṃ gataṃ vā atrasamācaritaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:109_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:109_2: apuṇyakarma katamat / akuśalaṃ karma / āniṃjyakarma katamat / rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
SA01asabhs_u:109_3: / yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti /
SA01asabhs_u:111_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:111_1: sādhāraṇaṃ karma katamat / yatkarma bhājanaloke nānāvidhaṃ vikalpaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:111_2: / asādhāraṇaṃ karma katamat / yatkarma sattvaloke nānavidhaṃ vikalpaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:111_6: yataḥ sūtre uktam / yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:111_10: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:111_11_0: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:111_11_1: paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti
SA01asabhs_u:111_12: yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo [Abhidh-s_56] balavadityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:111_13: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:111_14: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:111_15: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:111_18: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca /
SA01asabhs_u:112_0_0: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā
SA01asabhs_u:112_0_1: vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate
SA01asabhs_u:112_1_0: yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā
SA01asabhs_u:112_1_1: tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca
SA01asabhs_u:112_3: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante /
SA01asabhs_u:112_4_0: yat sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate duḥkhasahagatasya
SA01asabhs_u:112_4_1: karmaṇo duḥkhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate aduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya karmaṇastatsahagata
SA01asabhs_u:112_6: sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:112_7: duḥkhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:113_2: saṃvarakarma katamat / prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma anāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:113_5: bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇavasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerī saṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvaraḥ upāsikāsaṃvaraḥ upavāsasaṃvaraśca /
SA01asabhs_u:113_15: yathā ṣaṇḍapaṇḍakānām / teṣā mupāsakasaṃvaraḥ pratiṣidhyate na vā /
SA01asabhs_u:113_19: paṇḍakaḥ punaḥ pañcavidhaḥ / jātipaṇḍakaḥ īrṣyāpaṇḍakaḥ pakṣapaṇḍakaḥ āsecanakapaṇḍakaḥ āpatpaṇḍakaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:114_1: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ vījopaghāte sati kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā viratiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:116_0: asaṃvarakarma katamat / abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato vā tatkarmādhyācāraniścayaḥ asaṃvara ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:116_1_0: te punarasaṃvarāḥ katame / aurabhrikāḥ kaukkṛṭikāḥ śaukarikāḥ śākunikāḥ mātsyikāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:116_1_1: lubdhakāḥ vāgurikāḥ corāḥ ghātakāḥ govaṃdhakāḥ nāgavaṃdhakāḥ māṇḍalikāḥ nāgamaṇḍalikāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:118_1: sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:118_3: kāmāvacarāt tṛtīyadhyānaṃ yāvad yat kuśalaṃ karma /
SA01asabhs_u:119_1: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:119_3: tatkarma dṛṣṭe dharme yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:119_4: tacca maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasyaṃ parihāṇiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:119_5: / yathā maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasya tathā araṇasamāpatteruccalitasya niurodhasamāpatteruccalitasya strotāpattiphalāduccalitasya arhattvaphalāduccalitasya ca /
SA01asabhs_u:119_6: buddhapramukhe saṃghe kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:119_7: / anyeṣāṃ tīvrāśayaprayogeṇa kuśalākuśalakarmapratipannānāmapi dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:119_9: tatkarma anantare janmani yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:119_11: api ca yānyanyāni kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi yeṣāmanantare janmani vipāko vipacyate tatsarvamucyate upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma /
SA01asabhs_u:120_1: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma /
SA01asabhs_u:120_3: akuśalaṃ karma // śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma katamat /
SA01asabhs_u:120_4: traidhātukaṃ kuśalaṃ karma // kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma katamat /
SA01asabhs_u:120_5: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ karma yat karma vā āśayataḥ prayogato vā śuklaṃ yat karma vā prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklam /
SA01asabhs_u:120_7_0: prayogānantaryamārge 'nāsravaṃ karma aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravakarmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyasvabhāvamadhikṛtya
SA01asabhs_u:120_7_1: vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:120_9: dānakarma katamat / nidānataḥ utthānataḥ pradeśataḥ svabhāvataśca dānakarma vikalpyate /
SA01asabhs_u:120_12: / pradeśo deyāni vastūni // svabhāvo dānasaṃpattikāle kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi /
SA01asabhs_u:120_13: / dānasaṃpat katamā / abhīkṣṇadānataḥ apakṣapātadānataḥ icchāparipūraṇadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:120_14: api ca aniśritadānataḥ mahāśucidānataḥ parama prahṛṣṭadānataḥ abhikṣṇadānataḥ kṣetrabhājanadānataḥ navapurāṇasaṃvibhāgadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:120_15: / deyasaṃpat katamā / anabhidutadeyavastutaḥ aparāpakṛtadeyavastutaḥ akuthitavimaladeyavastutaḥ śucideyavastutaḥ dharmārjitadeyavastutaśca deyasaṃpad veditavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:121_1: tathācoktaṃ sūtre śīlasamanvāgataḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu iti /
SA01asabhs_u:122_0: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yad buddhena sūtreṣu nirdṛṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi /
SA01asabhs_u:122_4: avipratisārādīnāṃ krameṇa saṃpratipattyā yāvat samādhilābhasanniśraya taḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:123_1: karmasvakā karmadāyādāḥ karmayonīyāḥ karmapratisaraṇāḥ karma sarvān sattvān vibhajati uccanīcatayā hīnapraṇītatayā [Abhidh-s_61] iti /
SA01asabhs_u:123_11: yat karmaṇā sugatau durgatau vātmabhāvaprabhedaṃ labhante /
SA01asabhs_u:124_3: akuśalasya karmaṇo hīnāsu tisṛṣu durgatiṣu aniṣṭavipākalābhaścintyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:124_10: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā cittavaśitayā pariṣkāravaśitayā karmavaśitayā upapattivaśitayā adhimuktivaśitayā praṇidhānavaśitayā ṛddhivaśitayā jñānavaśitayā dharmavaśitayā /
SA01asabhs_u:125_0: tathā ca samudayasatyaṃ samāsato lakṣaṇaprabhedena caturvidham /
SA01asabhs_u:125_2: hetulakṣaṇaṃ katamat / punarbhavavāsanāyā āhārakaṃ kāraṇaṃ heturiti hetulakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:125_3: / samudayalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / teṣāṃ teṣāmupacitavāsanānāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye udayasya kāraṇamiti [Abhidh-s_62] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:125_4: / prabhuvalakṣaṇaṃ katamat / pratyātmaṃ santānānāṃ sarvaprakāraprakarṣodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:127_0_0: nirodhasatyaṃ katamat / lakṣaṇataḥ gāmbhīryataḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthataḥ aparipūritaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:127_0_1: paripūritaḥ niralaṃkārataḥ sālaṃkārataḥ śeṣataḥ aśeṣataḥ agrataḥ paryāyataśca nirodhasatyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:128_0: lakṣaṇataḥ katamat / tathatāyāmārya mārge kleśānāmanutpādo yo nirodhāśrayo nirodhako nirodhasvabhāvo vā /
SA01asabhs_u:128_1: / tannirodhasatyalakṣaṇam // yaduktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣuḥ śrotre ghrāṇajivhākāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:128_2: manaśca teṣu āyataneṣu nāmarūpayorātyantikanirodho na śeṣaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:128_3: yaccoktaṃ tadāyatanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā cakṣuśca nirudhyate rūpasaṃjñā ca virajyate yāvat manaśca nirudhyate dharmasaṃjñā ca virajyate iti /
SA01asabhs_u:128_4: anena nayena ālambanānāṃ prāpaṇaṃ tathatāyāmālambanādūrdhvaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:129_1: tathoparamāt teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodho nānyo vācyaḥ nānanyo vācyaḥ nāpyanyo nāpyananyo vācyaḥ na naivānyo nānanyo vācyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:129_2: / kutaḥ / niṣprapañcataḥ / asmiṃstvarthe prapañcotpattiḥ na saṃcintyā na mārgeṇa na nyāyena na kuśalaprayogeṇa cintyā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:129_3: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
SA01asabhs_u:129_4: syādanyaḥ syādananyaḥ syādanyo 'pi nānyo 'pi [Abhidh-s_63] syānnaivānyo nānanyo 'pi iti niṣprapañca prapañca utpadyate /
SA01asabhs_u:129_6: / yadā ṣaḍāyatanānāṃ nirodhaśchedaḥ tadā prapañcānāṃ viratiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:130_0: saṃvṛtitaḥ katamat / laukikamārgairvījanigraheṇa yo nirodho labhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:130_2: / paramārthataḥ katamat / āryaprajñayā bījanirmūlanena yo nirodho labhyate /
SA01asabhs_u:130_3: / aparipūritaḥ katamat / śaikṣāṇāṃ strotāpannaphalasaṃgraheṇa vā sakṛdāgamiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā anāgāmiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā yo nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:130_6: / sālaṃkārataḥ katamat / ubhayabhāga vimuktānāṃ traividyānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñānāmarhatāṃ yo nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:130_7: / śeṣataḥ katamat / sopadhiśeṣo yo nirodhaḥ // aśeṣataḥ katamat / nirupadhiśeṣo yo nirodhaḥ // agrataḥ katamat / buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇasaṃgraheṇa yo nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:131_0: paryāyataḥ katamat / aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
SA01asabhs_u:132_30: / kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ sauvarṇikamityucyate paramārthasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:133_2: kimupādāya nirodhalakṣaṇam / kleśavisaṃyogatāmupādāya // kimupādāya śāntalakṣaṇam / duḥkhavisaṃyogatāmupādāya / kimupādāya praṇītalakṣaṇam / sukhaśucyadhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:135_0: mārgasatyaṃ katamat / yena duḥkhaṃ parijānīte samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01asabhs_u:135_2: / punaḥ mārgaḥ pañcavidhaḥ / saṃbhāramārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ darśanamārga bhāvanāmārgaḥ niṣṭhāmārgaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:136_0_0: saṃbhāramārgaḥ katamaḥ / pṛthagjanānāṃ śīlam indriyadvārarakṣā bhojane mātrājñatā
SA01asabhs_u:136_0_1: prathamarātrau taduttararātriṣu vā nityamamiddhaṃ vīryabhāvanā śamathavipaśyanā saṃprajanyavihāraśca /
SA01asabhs_u:136_1: / yadvā punaranyadaupaniṣadaṃ kuśalam śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA01asabhs_u:137_0: prayogamārgaḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ saṃbhāramārgaḥ sa prayogamārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:137_2: saṃbhāramārgopacitāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni ūṣmagataḥ mūrdhānaḥ satyānukūlakṣānti laukikāgradharmaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:137_3: / ūṣmagataṃ katamat / pratyātmaṃ satye pvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:137_4: / mūrdhānaṃ katamat / pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvālokavṛddhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:137_5: / satyānukūlakṣāntiḥ katamā / pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvekadeśapraviṣṭānusṛtaḥ [Abhidh-s_66] samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:137_6: / laukikāgradharmaḥ katamaḥ / pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvānantaryacittasamādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:138_0: darśanamārgaḥ katamaḥ / samāsato laukikā gradharmānantaramanupalambhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:139_1_0: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:139_1_1: samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:139_1_2: nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ
SA01asabhs_u:140_0: dukhaṃ katamat / duḥkhasatyam // duḥkhe dharmaḥ katamaḥ / duḥkhasatyādhipateyaḥ śāsanadharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:140_2: / jñānakṣāntiḥ katamā / pūrvādhipatibalavicāraṇāmupādāya pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatye pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā /
SA01asabhs_u:140_6: kṣāntyanantaraṃ yena jñānena pūrvoktebhyaḥ kleśebhyo vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:140_9: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:141_1: kṣāntirjñānakṣayo jñeyaḥ / tatra avasthāyāṃ dharmakṣāntijñānaiḥ grāhyāvanoghaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:141_3: api ca eṣu sarveṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu animittaprekṣāvihārī veditavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:142_3: tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena prāpaṇanimittapramāṇaiḥ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA01asabhs_u:142_4: vikalpanataḥ katamat / abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena jñānena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpoyanto yadabhyasyanti /
SA01asabhs_u:142_5: / anubhavataḥ katamat / tathābhyasyanto mayā (?yadā)dito darśanamārgākhyāṃ lokottarāṃ niṣprapañcāvasthāṃ pratyātmamanubhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:142_6: / paripūritaḥ katamat / tadūrdhvaṃ yāmāśrayaparivṛttiṃ paripūrya yāvadadhigamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpnuvanti /
SA01asabhs_u:143_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre virajño vītamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūdapādi iti /
SA01asabhs_u:143_2: tatra dharmakṣāntibhirvirajaḥ dharmajñānairvītamalam parijñayā prahāṇena mārgaśuddhilābhena ca /
SA01asabhs_u:144_0_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā sarvaiḥ tīrṇakāṃkṣaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:144_0_1: tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayaḥ śāstuḥ śāsano 'nanyaneyaḥ dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
SA01asabhs_u:144_6: aparapratyayaḥ mārgabhāvanāyāṃ na parataḥ svayaṃ kuśalāvarjanena /
SA01asabhs_u:145_0: bhāvanāmārgaḥ katamaḥ / darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ laukiko mārgo lokottaramārgaḥ mṛdumārgo madhyamārgo 'dhimātro mārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ vimuktimārgaḥ viśeṣamārgaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_0: laukiko mārgaḥ katamaḥ / laukikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamākāśānattyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcatyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_2: / kathaṃ saṃkleśataḥ / catvāryavyākṛtamūlāni tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭirmāno 'vidyā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_7: tathā ca saṃkliṣṭacetasāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ pravarttante /
SA01asabhs_u:146_8: / kathaṃ vyavadānataḥ / śuddhakā dhyānārūpyāḥ kuśalatvād vyavadātā ityucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:146_9: / kathaṃ vyavasthānataḥ / aṅgavyavasthānataḥ samāpattivyavasthānataḥ mātrāvyavasthānataḥ saṃjñākaraṇavyavasthānaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_11: pañcāṅgāni vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_13: catvāryaṅgāni adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāpratā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_14: / tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgam / pañcāṅgāni upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_16: catvāryaṅgāni upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_17: / pratipakṣāṅgamupādāya anuśaṃsāṅgamupādāya tadubhayāśrayasvabhāvāṅgaṃ copādāya ārupyeṣvaṅgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti /
SA01asabhs_u:146_21: / sapta manaskārāḥ katame / lakṣaṇaprati saṃvedī manaskāraḥ ādhimokṣikaḥ prāvivejaḥ ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ prayoganiṣṭhāphalaśca [Abhidh-s_69] manaskāraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:146_22: / kathaṃ mātrāvyavasthānataḥ / prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ suduparibhāvitaṃ madhyaparibhāvitamadhimātraparibhāvitaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:146_24: / mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitasya prathamasya dhyānasya phalaṃ trividhā prathamā dhyānopapattiḥ /
