SA01asabhs_u:146_25: yathā prathamasya dhyānasya evaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ dhyānānāṃ trividhā dhyānopapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:146_30: teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nāmābhijñā api na bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:146_32: / kathaṃ viśuddhitaḥ / prāntakoṭikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ viśuddhirityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:147_0_0: lokottaro mārgaḥ katamaḥ / bhāvanāmārge duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni dharmajñānānvayapakṣyāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:147_0_1: taiśca saṃprayuktaḥ samādhiḥ prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ,
SA01asabhs_u:147_2: tata ścānimittamityucyate // yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yāvadeva saṃjñāsamāpattiḥ tāvadājñāprativedha iti /
SA01asabhs_u:148_1: mṛdumārgaḥ katamaḥ / mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇā kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmāvadhimātrādhimātramadhimātramadhyamadhimātrāmṛduṃ kleśaprakāra prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:149_0_0: madhyo mārgaḥ katamaḥ / madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:149_0_1: kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau madhyādhimātraṃ madhyamadhyaṃ madhyamṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:150_0_1: traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau mṛdvadhimātraṃ mṛdumadhyaṃ mṛdumṛduṃ
SA01asabhs_u:151_0: prayogamārgaḥ katamaḥ / yena kleśaṃ prajahāti // ānantaryamārgaḥ katamaḥ / yasyānantaraṃ nirantaraḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇo bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:151_1: / vimuktimārgaḥ katamaḥ / yena prahīṇe kleśe vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:151_2: / viśeṣamārgaḥ katamaḥ / tadanyasya kleśaprakārasya prayogānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ viśeṣamārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:151_3: api khalu kleśaprahāṇaprayogaṃ nirākṛtya dharmacintāyāṃ vā prayuktasya dharmavihāre vā samāpattiviśeṣe vā yo mārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:151_4: api khalu vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharato vā yo mārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:152_0: mārgabhāvanā katamā / pratilaṃbhabhāvanā niṣevaṇabhāvanā nirdhāvanabhāvanā pratipakṣabhāvanā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:152_1: / pratilambhabhāvanā katamā / anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāya yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_2: / niṣevaṇabhāvanā katamā / utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_3: nirdhāvanabhāvanā katamā / utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_4: / pratipakṣabhāvanā katamā / anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśakunāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya [Abhidh-s_71] yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_5: / api khalu mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāmava sthāpayati sā pratilambhabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_6: sa eva saṃmukhībhūto bhāvanāṃ gacchati sā niṣevaṇabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:152_9: / api khalu caturvidhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ dūrībhāvapratipakṣaśca pratipakṣabhāvanetyucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:152_12: / prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ katamaḥ / prayogāntaryamārgaḥ // ādharapratipakṣaḥ katamaḥ / vimuktimārgaḥ / dūrībhāvapratipakṣaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:153_0_0: api khalu vastuparīkṣāmārgaḥ vyāvasāyiko mārgaḥ samādhiparikarmamārgaḥ abhisamayaprāyogiko
SA01asabhs_u:153_0_1: mārgaḥ abhisamayaśliṣṭo mārgaḥ abhisamayamārgaḥ viśuddhinairyāṇiko mārgaḥ niśrayendriyabhinno
SA01asabhs_u:153_0_2: mārgaḥ śikṣātrayapariśodhano mārgaḥ sarvaguṇanirhārako mārgaḥ mārgasaṃgrahamārgaśca
SA01asabhs_u:153_1: / sa punareṣa yathākramaṃ saptatriṃśadabodhipakṣā dharmāḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ catvāri dharmapadāni śamatha(ai) vipaśyanā triṇī cendriyāṇī /
SA01asabhs_u:154_0: smṛtyupasthānānāmālamvanaṃ svabhāvaḥ sahāyaḥ bhāvanā bhāvanāphalañca veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:154_3: kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ // api khalvātmāśrayavastu ātmopabhogavastu ātmavastu ātmasaṃkleśavyavadānavastu ca /
SA01asabhs_u:154_4: / svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / prajñā smṛtiśca // sahāyaḥ katamaḥ / tatsaṃprayuktāścittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:154_7: / adhyātmaṃ kāyaḥ katamaḥ / yānyasmin kāye ādhyatmikāni rūpīṇyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:154_8: / bahirdhākāyaḥ katamaḥ / bahirdhā rūpīṇyāyatanāni // adhyātmavahirddhā kāyaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:154_11: kāye kāyānupaśyanā katamā / yā vikalpapratibimbakāyena prakṛtibimbakāyasya samatāpaśyanā /
SA01asabhs_u:154_12: adhyātmaṃ vedanā katamā / adhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannā vedanā /
SA01asabhs_u:154_13: / bahirddhā vedanā katamā / bahirddhā kāyamupādayotpannā vedanā /
SA01asabhs_u:154_17: / yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā evaṃ vedanādiṣu vedanādyanupaśyanā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:154_18: api khalu bhāvanā chando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāhaḥ utsūḍhiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ apramādaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:154_28: / bhāvanāphalaṃ katamat / catu rviparyāsaprahāṇaṃ catuḥ satyāvatāraḥ kāyādivisaṃyogaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:155_2: / svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / vyāyāmaḥ // sahāyaḥ katamaḥ / tatsaṃprayuktāścittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:155_3: bhāvanā katamā / taduktaṃ sūtre chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti cittaṃ pradadhāti /
SA01asabhs_u:155_6: bhāvanā phalaṃ katamat / aśeṣavipakṣahāniḥ pratipakṣapratilambhaḥ pratipakṣavṛddhiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:156_2: / svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / samādhiḥ // sahāyaḥ katamaḥ / chandovīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:156_3: / chandasamādhiḥ katamaḥ / yatsatkṛtya prayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_4: / vīryasamadhiḥ katamaḥ / yatsātatya prayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_5: / cittasamādhiḥ katamaḥ / pūrvasamādhibhāvanāmāgamya svarasena spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_6: / mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ katamaḥ / deśanādharmaśravaṇamāgamya pratyātmaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_7: / punaḥ chandasamādhiḥ yat chandaṃ janayan spṛśati cittasyaikagratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_9: / cittasamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pradadhat spṛśati cittasyaigratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_10: / mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pragṛṇhan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01asabhs_u:156_12: katame aṣṭau / chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā praśrabdhiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ cetanā upekṣā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:156_17: / phalaṃ katamat / kuśalasamādhiparikarmataḥ yathākarmaṃ dharmābhijñā yathācittamabhijñāpradarśanam /
SA01asabhs_u:156_18: api ca teṣu teṣu dharmeṣu adhigamaḥ prātiḥ karmaṇyatā vaśitā kāritraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nānāvidhānāmṛdudhyādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ niṣpādanamadhiguṇānāṃ nirhāraśca /
SA01asabhs_u:157_2: catvāryāryasatyāni // svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:157_4: / bhāvanā katamā / yat śraddhendriyeṇa satyeṣu abhisaṃpratyayasamutthānaṃ prayogabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:159_2: svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:159_3: / smṛtiḥ saṃniśrayāṅgam / dharmavicayaḥ svabhāvāṅgam / vīryaṃ niryāṇāṅgam / prītiḥ anuśaṃsāṅgam / praśrabdhiḥ / samādhiḥ upekṣā cāsaṃkleśāṅgam /
SA01asabhs_u:159_6: / bhāvanā katamā / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgam /
SA01asabhs_u:160_2: / svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ / samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyakkarmmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:160_10_0: / bhāvanā katamā / bhāvanā tu bodhyaṅgavat // bhāvanā phalaṃ katamat / paricchedaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:161_0: catasraḥ pratipadaḥ katamāḥ / duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā /
SA01asabhs_u:163_0: śamathaḥ katamaḥ / adhyātmaṃ cittasya upanibandhaḥ sthāpanā saṃsthāpanā avasthāpanā upasthāpanā damanaṃ śamanaṃ vyupaśamanam ekotīkaraṇaṃ samādhānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:163_1: / vipaśyanā katamā / yā dharmān vicinoti pravivinoti parivitarkkayati parimīmāṃsamāpataye /
SA01asabhs_u:163_2: ca kāma pratipakṣadauṣṭhulyanimittasaṃyojanataḥ kāmābhibhavānāṃ viparyāsataḥ aviparyastacittasyāvasthāpanataśca /
SA01asabhs_u:163_8: ekatyaḥ na śamathasya lābhī nāpi vipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:163_11: tasya śamathavipaśyanobhayamārga yuktasya samaṃ yugapat pravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:164_3: / ājñendriyaṃ katamat / ṣoḍaśāt darśanamārgacittakṣaṇādrūdhvaṃ sarvasmin śaikṣamārge yadindriyam /
SA01asabhs_u:165_0: prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakānyapi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01asabhs_u:165_1_0: teṣu vibhutvalābhataḥ / yathā prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakāni
SA01asabhs_u:165_1_1: bhāvanāṃ gacchanti tathā sarvepāmūrdvabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge adhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni
SA01asabhs_u:166_0: niṣṭhāmārgaḥ katamaḥ / vajropamaḥ samadhiḥ / sarvadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratipraśrabdheḥ sarvasaṃyogānāṃ prahāṇāt sarvavisaṃyogānāmadhigamācca /
SA01asabhs_u:166_1: tadanantaraṃ nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ prāptakṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:166_2: katame daśa / aśaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭiryāyada śaikṣasya samyaksamādhiḥ aśaikṣasya samyagvimokṣaḥ aśaikṣasya samyag jñānaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:166_4_0: / katamāni sarvadauṣṭhulyāni / saṃ kṣepataścaturviśatiḥ / tadyathā sarvatragamabhilāpadauṣṭhulyaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:166_8: bhāvanāmārgagatasya taduttaraṃ saṃyojanaprahāṇamārgavasthāyāṃ yaḥ samādhiḥ prayogamārgasaṃgraho vā ānantaryamārgasaṃgraho vā /
SA01asabhs_u:166_9: prayogamārgasaṃgrahastu tataḥ paraṃ sarvairāvaraṇairacchādyaḥ sarvāvarāṇānāṃ ca bhedaka iti /
SA01asabhs_u:166_11: sa ca samādhiḥ nirantaraḥ dṛḍhaḥ ekarasaḥ vyāpī ca /
SA01asabhs_u:166_12: / etadarthapratibimbanārthaṃ [Abhidh-s_77] bhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā mahāśailaparvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekaghanaḥ susaṃvṛtto daśadigvātākampyaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:166_16: / kṣayajñānaṃ katamat / hetukṣayeṇa yad śānaṃ labhyate kṣayaviṣayā lambanaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:166_17: / anutpādajñānaṃ katamat / phalaprahāṇena yad jñānaṃ labhyate phalānutpattiviṣayālambanaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:166_18: / daśāśaikṣā dharmāstu aśaikṣāṇāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:168_3: / kena hetunā satyeṣu anityaduḥkhādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa lauaukikākārāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:168_6: lokottarākāreṣu varttamāno 'nityārthaṃ paśyati sākṣādanubhavati notvanityaṃ paśyati abhilāpaprapañcamukhena /
SA01asabhs_u:168_7: yathā anityākārā anityārthe evaṃ śiṣṭhākarāḥ śiṣṭārtheṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:170_1: katamāni dvādaśāṅgāni / sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam avadānam itivṛtakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyam adbhutadharmaḥ upadeśaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:171_1: daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyan tathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati sukhaṃ vyavasthāpayati sukhaṃ deśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:171_2: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati /
SA01asabhs_u:171_3: buddhe 'vetyaprasādaṃ labhate dharme saṃghe cāvetya prasādaṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:172_0: 2. geyaṃ katamat / sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate /
SA01asabhs_u:173_0: 3. vyākaraṇaṃ katamat / tat sthāneṣu samatikrāntānāmatītānāmārya śrāvakāṇāṃ prāptyutpattiprabhedavyākaraṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:174_0: 4. gāthā katamā / sūtreṣu pādayogena deśyate / dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā //
SA01asabhs_u:175_0: 5. udānaṃ katamat / sūtreṣu kadācit tathāgatena āttamanaskena yadudāhṛtam //
SA01asabhs_u:176_0: 6. nidānaṃ katamat / pṛṣṭena yad bhāṣitam / sotpattikaṃ śikṣāprajñāptekaṃ vā / ato 'pi nidānam //
SA01asabhs_u:178_0: 8. itivṛttakaṃ katamat / yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ pūrvalaukikaṃ vṛttaṃ deśayati //
SA01asabhs_u:179_0: 9. jātakaṃ katamat / yat bodhisattvacaritapiṭakasaṃprayuktaṃ vṛttaṃ deśayati //
SA01asabhs_u:180_4: / kimarthamucyate vaidalyam / sarvāvaraṇavidalanataḥ // kimarthamucyate vaitulyam / upamānadharmāṇāṃ tulanābhāvataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:181_0: 11. adbhutadharmaḥ katamaḥ / yatra śrāvakabodhisattvatathāgatānāṃ paramā dbhutāścaryadharmāṇāṃ deśanā /
SA01asabhs_u:183_0: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:183_1: katamāni trīṇi / sūtrapiṭakaṃ vinayapiṭakam abhidharmapiṭakaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:183_3: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:183_4: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:183_5: vaipulyamadbhutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:183_6: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:185_0: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:185_2: / yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:185_6: / saṃprayogaḥ katamaḥ / anyo 'nyasahāyabhāvena ālambane ākāraiḥ saṃpratipattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:187_8_0: / kṣayabhāvikatā katamā / skandhadhātvāyatanāni // yathāvadbhāvikatā katamā / catvāri
SA01asabhs_u:187_8_1: āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve
SA01asabhs_u:187_11: / ṣoḍaśākāreṣu śūnye kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:187_12: dvau / apraṇihite kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:189_1: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:189_5: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01asabhs_u:190_1: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:191_3: kāryakāraṇayuktiḥ katamā / pṛthaglakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ kāryakāraṇāni /
SA01asabhs_u:191_6: / dharmatāyuktiḥ katamā / anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā /
SA01asabhs_u:192_3: / nāmaparyeṣaṇā katamā / dharmeṣu nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyānāmapariniṣpannaṃ svalakṣaṇamiti [Abhidh-s_82] yā santīraṇā /
SA01asabhs_u:192_4: / vastuparyeṣaṇā katamā / dharmāṇāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāmapariniṣpakṣaṃ khalakṣaṇamiti yā saṃtīraṇā /
SA01asabhs_u:193_2: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ /
SA01asabhs_u:194_1: pañcākārāḥ / ādhāraḥ ādhānam ādarśaḥ ālokaḥ āśrayaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:194_2: ādhāraḥ katamaḥ / saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam /
SA01asabhs_u:197_1: bahuśrutatāmupādāya // kathamarthakuśalo bhavati / abhidharme abhivinaye lakṣaṇajñatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:200_0: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate /
SA01asabhs_u:200_2: / kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyā(ḥ) sattvā audāryagāmbhīryaṃ nādhimucyante uttrasanti /
SA01asabhs_u:200_4: / kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:200_7: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante /
SA01asabhs_u:200_9_1: pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:200_9_2: prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:201_1: tatra ko 'bhisandhiḥ / svayamabhāvatāmupādāya svenātmanābhāvatāmupādāya sve bhāve 'navasthitātma (tā)mupādāya bālagrāhavaccālakṣaṇatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:201_2: / api khalu parikalpite svabhāve lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya paratantre utpattiniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya pariniṣpanne paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:201_3: / anutpannā aniruddhā ādiśāntā(ḥ) prakṛtiparinirvṛtā iti ko 'bhisandhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:205_0: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:205_1: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?) bhāvanā yathākramam /
SA01asabhs_u:206_0: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:209_0: prāptiviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepato dvividhaḥ / pudgalavyavasthānataḥ abhisamaya vyavasthāpanataśca draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:210_1_0: pudgalavyavasthānaṃ katamat / samāsataḥ saptavidham / roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ
SA01asabhs_u:211_0: rogacaritaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / saptavidhaḥ / rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:211_1: / niryāṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / trividhaḥ / śrāvakayānikaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaḥ mahāyānikaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:211_2: / ādhāraprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / trividhaḥ / asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:211_3: / prayogaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:211_4_0: / phalaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / saptaviṃśatividhaḥ / śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī
SA01asabhs_u:211_4_3: arhan saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī
SA01asabhs_u:211_4_5: arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan prativedhadharmā
SA01asabhs_u:211_7: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:211_8_0: / caryāprabhedaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepataḥ pañcavidhaḥ / adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:211_8_1: adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī
SA01asabhs_u:212_1: tīvrā yatarāgaḥ / evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:213_1_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye
SA01asabhs_u:213_3_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:213_3_1: svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:213_3_4: ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:213_5_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya
SA01asabhs_u:213_5_2: sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ
SA01asabhs_u:214_1: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_3: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_5: satyādhipatayaṃ dharmamālambya adhimātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ adhimātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ [Abhidh-s_88] tajjanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_6: / punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_7: / saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_8: / saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:214_9: / tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:215_1: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:215_2: / dharmānusārī katamaḥ / saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:216_0: śraddhādhimuktaḥ katamaḥ / phalakāle śraddhānusārī yaḥ pugdalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:216_1: / dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ katamaḥ / phalakāle dharmānusārī yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:216_2: / kāyasākṣī katamaḥ / śaikṣaḥ aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyī yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:216_3: / prajñāvimuktaḥ katamaḥ / kṣīṇāsravo bhotvaṣṭavimokṣadhyāyo yaḥ pugdalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:216_8: / strota āpakṣaḥ katamaḥ / ṣoḍaśe darśanamārgacittakṣaṇe yaḥpudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_2: dharmābhi[samaye]pi saḥ / kāmeṣvavītarāgaḥ pudgalaḥ samyaktvaniyāmamavakrāman strotaāpanno bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:217_5: / yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:217_6: / kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:217_10: / api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:217_12: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_13: sakṛdāgāmī katamaḥ / bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarasya ṣaṣṭhasya kleśaprakā[rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_15: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_16: / anāgāmī pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_17: / yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:217_19: pradhānasaṃgrahamupādāya // prādhānyaṃ kimupādāya / gatyavara kāraṇatāṃ dhātvaparakāraṇatāṃ copādāya /
SA01asabhs_u:217_23: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_24: / yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:217_30: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo 'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_31: / kulaṃkulaḥ katamaḥ / deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_32: / ekavīcikaḥ katamaḥ / sakṛdāgāmī deveṣveva yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_33_0: / antarāparinirvāyī katamaḥ / upapattisaṃyojane prahīṇe abhinivṛttisaṃyojane aprahīṇe
SA01asabhs_u:217_33_2: abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya cetayannevayo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya
SA01asabhs_u:217_34: abhisaṃcetayitvā vā upapattibhavamabhisaṃprasthitaḥ [bhavānu]papatticchandaṃ yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_36: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_38: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_41: / ūrdhvaṃstrotāḥ katamaḥ / upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_42: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:217_43: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:217_45: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:218_1: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti /
SA01asabhs_u:218_2: / cetanādharmā arhan katamaḥ / mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti /
SA01asabhs_u:218_7: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati /
SA01asabhs_u:218_9: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati /
SA01asabhs_u:218_10: / akopyadharmā arhan katamaḥ / tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti /
SA01asabhs_u:218_14: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:218_16: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:218_17: saṃyojanaṃ nāvaśiṣyate // yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacarā api /
SA01asabhs_u:218_19: ārūpyadhātuvyavakarṣitena dhyānena saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:218_22: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:219_9: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:219_10: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:219_13: / sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:219_15: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati /
SA01asabhs_u:222_0: dharmābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:223_0: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:224_0: tattvābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / ṣoḍaśe darśanamārgacittakṣaṇe ya āryamārgaṃ pratilabhate /
SA01asabhs_u:224_2: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:226_0: ratnābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / buddhe 'vetya prasādaḥ dharme 'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe 'vetya prasādaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:227_1: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:228_0: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ / yathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārga uktaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:229_1: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:230_2: pūrvoktāḥ saptābhisamayāḥ / parato ghoṣamanāgamya pratilambhataḥ pratyekabuddhābhisamaya ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:231_1: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā /
SA01asabhs_u:232_1_0: saṃkṣepata ekādaśa / ālambanaviśeṣaḥ upastambhaviśeṣaḥ prativedhaviśeṣaḥ abhyupagamaviśeṣaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:233_3_0: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:233_3_1: abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:233_3_2: asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā
SA01asabhs_u:234_0_0: apramāṇāni katamāni / catvāri apramāṇāni / maitrī katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:234_0_1: sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā
SA01asabhs_u:234_1: / karuṇā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:234_2: / muditā katamā / [Abhidh-s_95] dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:234_3: / upekṣā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:235_0: vimokṣāḥ katame / aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ / kathaṃ rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:235_1_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:235_1_1: saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca
SA01asabhs_u:235_3: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:235_4: / kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:235_5_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā
SA01asabhs_u:235_5_1: anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:235_7: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:235_9_0: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo
SA01asabhs_u:235_9_1: vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddhau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād
SA01asabhs_u:236_1: abhibhvāyatanāni katamāni / aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni / pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:236_2: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:236_4: vaśavarttanatā mupādāya // sattvasaṃkhyātāni asattvasaṃkhyātāni cāśritya rūpāṇi parittādhimātrāṇyucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:237_0: kṛtsnāyatanāni katamāni / daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni / kṛtsnaspharaṇālambanatāmupādāya kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:237_1: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:238_0: araṇā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:239_0: praṇidhijñānaṃ katamat / dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:240_0: pratisaṃvidaḥ katamāḥ / catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ / dharmapratisaṃvid katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:240_1: / arthapratisaṃvid katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇe abhiprāye [Abhidh-s_97] cāvyāghātasamṛddau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:240_2: / niruktipratisaṃvid katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:240_4: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:241_0: abhijñā katamāḥ / ṣaḍabhijñāḥ / ṛddhyabhijñā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:241_1: / divyaśrotrābhijñā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:241_2: / cetaḥparyāyābhijñā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:241_4: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:241_5: / cyutyupapādābhijñā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:241_6: / āsravakṣayābhijñā katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:242_1: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:243_0_0: pariśuddhayaḥ katamāḥ / catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ / āśrayapariśuddhiḥ katamāḥ / dhyānaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:243_0_1: niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā
SA01asabhs_u:243_1: / ālambanapariśuddhiḥ katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:243_2: / cittapariśuddhiḥ katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:243_3: / jñānapariśuddhiḥ katamā / dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:244_1_0: balāni katamāni / baśa tathāgatabalāni / sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya
SA01asabhs_u:244_1_1: sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā
SA01asabhs_u:244_3: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:245_0: vaiśāradyāni katamāni / catvāri vaiśāradyāni // abhisaṃbodhivaiśāradyaṃ katamat /
SA01asabhs_u:245_1: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:245_3: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:245_5: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:245_7: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:246_0: smṛtyupasthānāni katamāni / trīṇyeva smṛtyupasthānāni / gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:247_0: arakṣāṇi katamāni / trīṇyeravārakṣāṇi // gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:248_0: asaṃpramoṣadharmatā katamā / sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:249_0: vāsanāsamudghātaḥ katamaḥ / sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:250_0: mahākaruṇā katamā / nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA01asabhs_u:251_3_1: asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:252_0: sarvākārajñatā katamā / skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:253_1: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:253_2: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vābhinirharati /
SA01asabhs_u:254_0: ta ete guṇā dvividhāḥ / svakāritrapratyupasthānāśca vaihārikāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:254_1: / ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:255_0: apramāṇaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti / vipakṣaṃ jahāti / anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate /
SA01asabhs_u:255_1: / vimokṣaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti / nirmāṇakarmābhinirharati / śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati /
SA01asabhs_u:255_3: adhimucyanatā mupādāya // abhibhvāyatanaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:255_7: / araṇayā kiṃ karma karoti / ādeyavacano bhavati // praṇidhijñānena kiṃ karma karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:255_13: vākkarmaṇā cittādeśanayāvarjayati sattvacaritaṃ ca jñātvā āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca niḥsaraṇe sattvān yathāvadavavadate /
SA01asabhs_u:255_18: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati /
SA01asabhs_u:255_19: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati /
SA01asabhs_u:255_20_0: / balaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti / ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca
SA01asabhs_u:255_20_1: samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:255_20_2: cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca saṃbhāraṃ ca bhavyatāṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathāvanniḥśreyasamārgaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:255_21: sarvamārāṃśca nigṛṇhāti sarvatra ca praśnaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:255_26: buddhakṛtyaṃ na hāpayati // vāsanāsamudghātena kiṃ karma karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:255_31: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhyā prāptyā cāreṇa vihāreṇa vābhibhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:255_33: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasaṃśayāṃ śchinatti dharmanetrīñca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati yena paripakṣā (? kṣyāḥ) sattvāḥ paripacyante paripakāśca vimucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:255_34: / eṣvabhisamayeṣūttarottaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ labhamānaḥ pūrvakaṃ hīnaṃ mārgaṃ vijahāti saṃkalanaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:255_35: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau śrāvakaḥ sarvammārgasamavasargavihānyā vijahāti no tu bodhisattvaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:257_0: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvo bodhimanava vadyāmavakrāntaḥ strotāpanno na bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:257_6: bodhisattvaḥ satyānyabhi samayena labdhvā daśasu mūmiṣu bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgaṃ bhāvayati na kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgam /
SA01asabhs_u:257_7: / tathā ca bodhiprāptaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca vijahāti arhan tathāgataśca saṃpadyate /
SA01asabhs_u:257_8: / sa ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvakleśāprahāṇāt mantroṣadhayo viṣamiva sarvakleśān abhibhavati sarvān kleśān doṣāṃśca notpādayati sarvāsu bhūmiṣu arhanniva kleśān prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:258_0_0: api khalu bodhisattvo jñeyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati upāyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati
SA01asabhs_u:258_0_1: abhūtaparikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati nirvikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati tena kālena
SA01asabhs_u:259_0: jñeyaṃ katamat / saṃkṣepeṇa ṣaḍvidham / bhrāntiḥ bhrāntyāśrayaḥ abhrāntyāśrayaḥ bhrāntyabhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ abhrāntiniṣyandaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:259_1: / upāyakauśalyaṃ katamat / saṃkṣeparāścaturvidham / [Abhidh-s_102] sattvaparipākakauśalyaṃ buddhadharmaparipuraṇakauśalyaṃ kṣiprābhijñākauśalyaṃ mārgānupacchedakauśalyaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:259_2_0: / abhūtaparikalpaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepato daśavidhaḥ / mūlavikalpaḥ nimittivikalpaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:259_3_0: / sa punaḥ daśavidhaḥ / abhāvavikalpa bhāvavikalpaḥ samāropavikalpaḥ apavādavikalpaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:259_3_1: ekatvavi kalpaḥ pṛthaktvavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpaḥ viśeṣavikalpaḥ yathānāmārthavikalpaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:259_4: / nirvikalpatā katamā / samāsatastrividhā / santuṣṭinirvikalpatā aviparyāsanirghikalpatā niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:259_6: / yāsau nimittato niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā tasyāḥ punaḥ abhāvasya pañca nimittāni /
SA01asabhs_u:259_7: na amanasikārataḥ na manasikārasamatikramataḥ na vyupaśamataḥ na svabhāvataḥ na ālambane 'bhisaṃskārataśca /
SA01asabhs_u:259_9: bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ indriyāpyuttāpayatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:262_0_0: sāṃkathyaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepataḥ saptavidhaḥ / arthaviniścayaḥ vyākhyāviniścayaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:263_0: arthaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / yatra ṣaḍarthānārabhya viniścayo bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:263_2: svabhāvārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārthaḥ yogārthaḥ vṛttyarthaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:263_5: / phalārthaḥ pañcaphalāni / vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:263_6: / karmārthaḥ pañca karmāṇi / upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyāvasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:263_7: / yogārthaḥ pañca yogāḥ / sāmūhiko yogaḥ ānubandhiko yogaḥ sāṃbandhiko yogaḥ āvasthiko yogaḥ vaikāriko yogaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:263_8: / vṛttyarthaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ / lakṣaṇavṛttiḥ avasthānavṛttiḥ viparyāsavṛttiḥ aviparyāsavṛttiḥ prabhedavṛttiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:264_0_0: vyākhyāviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / yena sūtrāntān vyācaṣṭe // sa punaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepeṇa
SA01asabhs_u:264_0_1: ṣaḍvidhaḥ / parijñeyavastu parijñeyo 'rthaḥ parijñopaniṣad parijñā parijñāphalam
SA01asabhs_u:264_2_0: katamāni caturdaśa / vyākhyāsaṃgrahamukham vastusaṃgrahamukham aṅgopāṅgamukham uggarottaranirhāramukham
SA01asabhs_u:264_2_2: nayamukham parijñādimukham balā balamukham pratyāhāramukham abhinirhāramukhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:265_1: yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacarakaḥ pūrvapadakaḥ paścātpadakaḥ dvikoṭikaḥ trikoṭikaḥ catuṣkoṭikaḥ oṃkāritaḥ prātikṣepika ityevamādayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:266_0: saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / aṣṭākārakāyadeśena aṣṭākārayāyadeśane ca [Abhidh-s_104] praśnavyākaraṇena sarvasatyamithyā viniścayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:267_0: saṃgrahaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / daśabhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgṛhīto viniścayaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:268_0: vādaviniścayaḥ katamaḥ / saṃkṣepataḥ saptavidhaḥ / vādaḥ vādādhikaraṇaṃ vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ bādālaṃkāraḥ vādanigrahaḥ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ bāde bahukarā dharmāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:269_1: vādaḥ pravādaḥ vivādaḥ apavādaḥ anuvāda avavāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:269_2: / vādaḥ sarvalokavacanam // pravādaḥ lokānuśruto vādaḥ / lokajñānapravādataḥ // vivādaḥ parasparaṃ viruddhayorvāde 'vasthānam /
SA01asabhs_u:269_5: / avavādaḥ sattvānāṃ asamāhitacittānāṃ cittasamādhānāya samāhitacittānāṃ vimokṣalābhāya deśanāvādaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:270_0: dvitīyaṃ vādādhikaraṇaṃ rājakulaṃ vā prajākulaṃ vā prāmāṇikānāṃ sahāyakānāṃ dharmārthakuśalānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ nādasabhā vā /
SA01asabhs_u:271_2_0: saṃkṣepato dvividham / sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca / sādhyaṃ dvividham / svabhāvo viśeṣaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:271_2_1: sādhanāni aṣṭau / pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:271_6: hetuḥ tasminneva sādhye apratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānam /
SA01asabhs_u:271_7: / dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa antena adṛṣṭāsya antasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam /
SA01asabhs_u:272_0: caturtho vādālaṃkāraḥ vādādhiṣṭhāne samyagyuktibhiḥ vādasabhāyāṃ gambhīro nipuṇaśca bhavatīti vādālaṃkāra ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:272_1: sa punaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ / svaparasamayajñatā vākkaraṇasaṃpad vaiśaradyaṃ pratibhānaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:273_2: / kathāsādaḥ anyavastupratisaraṇena vyāvṛttiḥ bāhyavastuvacanena mūlaparatijñāparityāgaḥ krodhamadamānamrākṣādi pradarśanaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:273_4: ākulaṃ saṃrabdham agamakam amitam anarthakam akālam asthiram apradīptam apravaddhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:274_0: ṣaṣṭhaṃ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ guṇadoṣau vicārya vādānniḥsaratyakaraṇena vā prativādityabhājanatāṃ parṣado vaiguṇyamātmano 'kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ na karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:274_1: prativādini bhājanatāṃ parṣado guṇavattvamātmanaḥ kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:275_2: svaparasamayajñatā yayā sarvatra nipuṇo vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:275_3: vaiśāradyaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ samagraparṣadi vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:275_4: pratimānaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ sarvāṃn kaṭhinān praśnān vyākaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:276_0: api khalu svahitasukha kāmena vādeṣu abhijñātuṃ pravarttitavyaṃ na paraiḥ vivādaṃ kartum /
SA01asabhs_u:276_2_2: samanupaśyatā na paraiḥ saha vivādaḥ kāryaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:276_7: katame ṣaṭ / asatpakṣabhiniveśadoṣaḥ kusṛtivacanadoṣaḥ akālikavākkaraṇadoṣaḥ kathāsādadoṣaḥ pārupyavacatadoṣaḥ cittāghātadoṣaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:276_15: nirantaraṃ kuśaladharme 'bhāvite tu asamāhicittasya kṣipraṃ samādhilābhaḥ samāhitacittasya vā kṣipraṃ vimokṣalābho durlabhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:278_2: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā rājānaṃ dvau bahuśrutau /
SA01asabhs_u:278_3: rāṣṭraṃ sānucaraṃ hatvā naro viśuddha ucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:279_0: api coktaṃ sūtre bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato dānapāra mitāyāṃ kṣipraṃ paripūriṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:279_2_0: dānena ca parikhidyate / yācanakaṃ ca dveṣṭi / na kiṃcit kadācid dadāti / dūre ca
SA01asabhs_u:279_2_1: bhavati dānasya // punaścoktaṃ sūtre / bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcadharmasamanvāgato
SA01asabhs_u:279_2_2: brahmacārī bhavati parameṇa viśuddhena brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:279_3: / katame pañca // nānyatra maithunyānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate /
